description: Need a respite from the heat of the playa? Camp "&" invites you to come enjoy our family-friendly face painting, shaved ice, spam musubi and more at our tiki themed afternoon events. And more? Yes, and more - come with your curious and curiouser spirit and you shall be rewarded with an even chillier treat.

name: 1001 Nights
description: 1001 Nights is a desert sanctuary where anyone who enters our dome is immediately welcomed, acknowledge and heard. We offer Makateeb where you can enjoy an Arabic coffee/tea while writing out your story for our treasure chest.  Once done, you can reach in and read a story left behind. In our main dome we will have DJs, musical acts, spoken word nights, movies under the stars, etc. The dome is decked out with foam flooring, mattresses, cushions, pillows, blankets and low top tables.  So one minute it can be our dancefloor and the next minute our lounge. Whatever the offering, we want people to feel like 1001 nights gives rest to weary souls desperate to recharge.  It should feel like you would want to stay with us for at least 1001 actual nights.

name: 17 Virgins
description: 17 Virgins invites you to the transdimensional portal. Come explore our 250' long tunnel to another universe! Who knows you may find a hidden doorway to the party of your dreams.

name: 3rd Alternative: Jail of Hedone
description: A large Old Western wooden-fronted enclosed space with air conditioning & cooling misters. This JAIL evokes Hedone, the Goddess of Sensual Pleasure and so, is stocked with cots, giant pillows and couches; snacks, water, cold beer & drinks (including our signature Absinthe-Whiskey craft cocktail) along with a stripper pole, whips & ticklers, great music, the occasional foot bath, along with sporty fun on the side, such as the Soccer Goalie of Death, Topless Soccer, BM Foosball and more! Come be judged and whipped and relax in A/C, and kick a few balls around!

name: 3SP (Third Space Place)
description: 3SP (Third Space Place) is your dusty, comfy front porch/living room combo serving as a Black Rock City "third space" — a relaxing, community spot offering a real sense of welcome and belonging beyond one's dwelling ("first space") and one's workplace ("second space"). As with any true third space, guests can stop by, relax, ask for directions, chat, or PARTICIPATE in one of 3SP's events focusing on all kinds of issues: being introverted on Playa; navigating the world as a stutterer/stammerer; identifying unconscious biases; Native-American appreciation versus appropriation; relaxing with essential oils or a camera obscura mediation; and more. We've been around since 2015 and we've got campers from DC, NYC, Minneapolis, Philly, Portland, LA, and beyond. Come on by!

name: 42 Ramen
description: We know the answer to the ultimate question. If you know it, come and tell us to claim your yummy prize.

name: 706 Tribe
description: A pioneer, convener, and incubator exploring unlimited possibilities of personal, spiritual, and social transformation. In the long term we aim to incubate various of communities experimenting with authentic relating, psychological support, and co-living space with its members. We will explore & incubate sustainable living powered by technologies, and experiments future lifestyles. We eagerly participate in building a more compassionate, inclusive, connected, and sustainable world.

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia since 2011 where merrymaking, mermaid lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground. Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren's call!

name: 8-bit Bunny
description: Join us in our steam sauna daily. Sweet out the dust and refresh yourself for another adventure on that playa, or spin the wheel at our bar for a drink. Rabbit ears encouraged but not required.

name: Ab Avo and Therapy Tea
description: Ab Avo and Therapy Tea is your place for the avocado toast and hot tea in the morning. Come by and enjoy 100 avocado toasts serving with hot tea Mon-Fri every morning on the first come first served basis! We're also facilitating therapy workshops teaching how to live a happier life. Check the schedule to find the one that works for you the best and come join our high vibes!

name: Abraxas Camp
description: Home of the Abraxas Dragon Art Car

name: Abstininthe
description: The friendly bar on the playa, providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millennium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambiance and conversation of our neighborhood bar.

name: Academy of Arts and Sciences
description: We're the scientists who are artists. And the artists with a passion for science. We can show you how a crystal is born, and then teach you to make wearable art with it. Want to look at the sun? Want to look at the sun and NOT go blind? We got you, and we'll even paint you up once you're done. Want to learn more about drug tests, or have a question for an OB/GYN? Stop on by for our lively and interesting debate and educational sessions. Feel like pursuing gallery worthy photos of Burning Man through the years? The Academy is the place to be You can also just kick back in the shade, trade a bad idea for a bad drink, and relax at the Bad Idea Bar - worst bar on the Playa (since 2010!).

name: A Confederacy of Dunces
description: We're a New Orleans based BIPOC and Queer welcoming group hailing from New Orleans, North Carolina, New York, Massachusetts, California, Oregon, Texas, Washington, DC, Alaska, Virginia, Kentucky, Africa, England, Brisbane, Australia, Belarus and South Africa.

name: Acorn Oasis
description: Are you as nuts about Squirrels as we are?! If these mischievous charmers and their playful antics bring you joy, then scurry over to Acorn Oasis! Explore our 24-hour one-of-a-kind Squirrel Museum, a hilarious tribute to the most renowned and significant squirrels throughout history. Dash over to our daily Squirrell Soirees to enjoy a glass of Bushy Tail Brew and immerse yourself in our playful Squirrel Playground, teeming with games that will test your agility and wit. At Acorn Oasis, we're all about celebrating the playful spirit of squirrels, so come and get squirrely with us!

name: AdramaNation
description: AdramaNation is an all inclusive and diverse camp focusing on a drama free and fun filled burn.  Engaging workshops, delicious delicacies, hydration, art, weddings, burnercise, and good company are to be found with us.  Whether you need a safe space to escape your drama or a place to meet new friends, you're always welcome here.

name: AerialKnotics
description: We teach, we share, we tie people up, we impact with pleasure.  Our passion is gifting our BDSM knowledge including beginner to intermediate rope bondage and impact play classes, aerial bondage Shibari performances, and daily meditation with a Kinky Monk.  Waste your precious time in our dungeon… please BYOFUT (Bring Your Own Fucked Up Toys).

name: Afterglow Lounge & Spa
description: A communal space of nurturement where wandering burners can rejuvenate, relax and recharge.  A caring place where burners can restore and reignite their radiant glow. Come to enjoy the spa, grab a drink and relax at the lounge, or get weird to the sound of our beats to show off that new sexy glow!

name: Agaric argileh
description: Art Support Camp for Agaric argileh

name: Airpusher Collective
description: The Airpusher camp is the port from which our fantastical airship begins and ends her voyages.  Join us for music and joy.  Check our event schedule and meet us at camp prior to our published airship rides to playa and beyond.

name: Airstreameri and What Not
description: Home to Playa's Best Postcards! Come craft unique art cards to gift back to the default world. Experience our giant mind-melting kaleidoscope, the VIXToscope! Photo booth, Yard games, Live 80s music & libations!

name: Alaska
description: We are a camp of just a few Alaskans. Come enjoy a breast milk White Russian from our very own nursing mother! Look for Alaska's flag.

name: Alborz
description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.

name: Alchemy Stop
description: Alchemy Stop is a dusty sanctuary for anyone to enjoy a quiet musical retreat with a cold hand-made limoncello in hand. Look for our open bar and block printing stations - we will be welcoming you with open arms.

name: Alice in Slumberland
description: It's finally our year! The oldest Alice themed bar on the playa is back, but much less Alice-themed than you'd expect! Known for intricate cocktails and zany decor, this year the bar returns with an extra small bar, an extremely obvious speakeasy, and a bicycle drink and drive through. We offer our classic chill lounge with Tarot readings open every afternoon (relaxing space open always). In the evenings our drink and drive through becomes a community firepit and fire dancing space, come have conversations with your neighbours. But careful, you might get trapped in a net if you don't pass our arbitrary DUI checks.

name: Alma Burekas
description: Moroccan atmosphere with Middle Eastern influence. An open bar serving signature cocktails every evening from sunset to dark, accompanied by our legendary burekas, and mint tea to warm you up at night.

name: Altepetl
description: Altepetl mutant vehicle support camp

name: Alter Ego
description: Camp ALTER EGO creates experiences through art that challenge and expand one's sense of self.

name: Alternative Energy Zone
description: A camp where you can come learn about how you can create a solar system to take care of your power needs large or small. 11am daily. Get a cocktail or pancakes, learn to figure draw and even get a positive attitude adjustment. We have Wifi gifted from the BM Org, shade and technical support from Solar to Excel...

name: Altitude Lounge
description: Come lounge on our tower overlooking the playa and see what you helped create while enjoying our down-tempo beats at sunset!

name: Always Open
description: Look out for black lights and a big OPEN sign! Come say hello!

name: AMAZONE
description: AmaZONE Wisdom Camp is inspired by the power of the largest river in the world. We started out as a Brazilian camp and, in that way, we honor our South American heritage. We see each of the 10 principles of Burning Man reflected and encapsulated in every water molecule: inclusive, self-reliant, participative, immediate... Like water, like life. We are a hub of people who get together to reinforce our beliefs and share our studies.We like to provide experiences so people can contemplate water and the natural forces that rule existence. We are a tool for awakening. We bring up practices to heal our body and soul and by doing that we heal the whole. Be water, my friend.

name: Amber Dust
description: Pagan vibes, sizzling sausages, the fun is here!

name: A Medium Place
description: Welcome to an impermanent realm of mediocre existence curated especially for Burning Man. Our uninspired camp is the not-so-premiere destination for unexpectedly disappointing experiences and half-assed fuckery; the metaphorical handy, where no one fucks yer Burn.

name: Amour Inn
description: Welcome to Amour Inn, a camp that radiates love in the heart of the Black Rock Desert. Our cozy lounge area, illuminated by twinkling lights, invites you to unwind and connect with others. Together, we celebrate the power of community and sharing. We'll be running contact improvisation classes and serving holistic drinks in a shaded area with enchanted tunes playing in the background. Come visit us at Amour Inn and experience the warmth and connection of our loving community!

name: Amulet
description: The Curious cross into the dome, and The Curiousor find the answers.    At our Amulet table, you'll be gifted a brass dog tag; pre-stamped with the Burning Man symbol. Our highly skilled Amulet Counselors will guide and inspire you to make your mark, and answer the great pressing questions of your life as you customize your Amulet. Using metal stamping tools you can add names, numbers, symbols, astrological signs, and Viking runes.  After you have all the answers, we'll put your Amulet on a necklace, keychain or bracelet for you when you're finished.

name: Android Oasis
description: Android Oasis offers a refreshing and reinvigorating respite from the heat and harshness of the playa. We offer a staffed  "brain & body spa" with multiple areas to take a load off and be treated to cold refreshments and body work. Come by for misting, massage, mindful music, and a mental break. Stay for the vibes, vines, and vivacious community!

name: And Then There's Only Love
description: Home of the world famous Orgy Dome – where couples & moresomes of all orientations are invited to come and play. We welcome the combination of love in all forms. We're a sex-positive, inclusionary, and exploratory space that's been a place of fire, fun, and passion since 2003. Everyone wishing to enter the Orgy Dome receives a detailed orientation covering Informed Enthusiastic Consent. Remember, anything other than an enthusiastic YES means NO! Our (relatively) dust free and air conditioned space is designed for people to experience social sexuality in a safe and respectful way. We have a 'Just Us' and an 'Open to More' section – so monogamous & non-monogamous folks are all welcome. And check out our daily workshops on many different sex-positive topics.

name: A-PLAYA-MASK
description: Breathe easy with the Maskman's quality N-95 Dusk Masks with the non toxic psychedelic Burning Man logo. And don't forget our Breathe Easy nose plugs, BM Stickers, and Pins.

name: Apotheosis
description: 4' x 8' APOTHEOSIS SIGN IN FRONT OF A 25' WIDE BY 12' TALL ARCHED TENT OPEN ON BOTH ENDS.

name: Après Ski Injury
description: Après Ski Injury is an interactive camp offering an Après-Ski Bar, a Morning Coffee Bar as well as a thrill ride: A ski ramp in the middle of the desert! Our bar is open every afternoon till late night and offers not only drinks, but entertainment, fun games and fire. You can also ski! We will have also two major events: 1. The Cryogenic Cocktail Experience, get vodka and gin ice cubes into mixer, frozen at −196 °C (−321 °F; 77 K) with liquid nitrogen live. 6 pm Tuesday. Literally the coolest event on Burning Man! 2. Zam Zam Zam! The biggest Austrian Style Cheers Worldwide. Come and be part of this new world record! 6 pm Thursday.

name: AquaZone Intentional Water Bar
description: Every Day – Intention infused water tastings by your friendly Watertenders, plus! Nail Polish Stations, Tarot, Conversation, Surrogate Playa Parent/Friend Counselor, 24 hour Hydration Refill Station and self-serve waters of intention. Our bottles of various still and bubbly waters each have a positive word inscribed on them. These bottles infuse the water they contain with the specific energy that each word evokes. Our Watertenders guide you through the AquaZone Intentional Water Bar ritual of choosing your intention for the moment. You decide!

name: Arabella's Lair
description: Arabella lives here.

name: Arbitrarium
description: We build this mutant vehicle on playa every year to share a reminder that you should never lose the child like wonder and imagination, nothing is that serious. "it's all performance Art!" Bill Gilman (Original SOS designer) You can't take a Giant furry yellow submarine sauntering across the playa with rainbow flowers lights and a crew that's wearing matching yellow rain gear bibs in the middle of the desert seriously.

name: Arcane Spirits
description: Come cast a love spell or hazard a curse! The cauldron is hot and the spirits are hungry: tarot, theme nights, and magical lore galore. The pointy hat is optional, but thirst is mandatory.

name: Arctica Ice Sales
description: Arctica Main 6:15 and Center Plaza

name: Arctica Ice Sales - Ice Cubed
description: Ice Cubed 3:00 & G Plaza

name: Arctica Ice Sales - Ice Nine
description: Ice Nine 9:00 & G Plaza

name: Arctica Outpost
description: Arctica Outpost 6:15 and K

name: Arctic Squeeze
description: Come on by for Cornhole and Treats!

name: Argonauts
description: Cherish the uncertain, challenge fear, welcome the odd, and seek thyself!  The Argonauts bring a unique and infectious spirit which we share across the playa and in conjunction with reenergizing camp activities including our high-noon ArgoDogs and ArgoShine-enhanced induction ceremonies.  Besides our Argonaut spirit and noontime hot dogs, our gifts include Argonaut dust, sun & fashion bandanas, temporary Argonaut tattoos, and spiritually-assigned individual Quests for each newly inducted Argonaut for the coming year.

name: Armageddon Bike Camp
description: It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing Bike Love on-playa for about 15 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Or fix your own bike at our Public Bike Repair stations, 24x7! We also host great parties, don't miss our Weds Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our 28ft dome 'living room' / shade structure provides the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!

name: Arrow Dynamic
description: Join us at The Arrow Bar each day from 2pm-6pm for drinks and shenanigans Arrow Party Wednesday night 9pm-12am 4 Mutant Vehicles patched for great sound. Look for the Arrow 40 feet in the air to guide you home at night

name: ArtBuilds
description: ArtBuilds support camp for Penumbra art installation

name: Art Car Camp
description: On Playa since 1994 a Place to gather and get your issues resolved To reunite with old friends and make new ones Gandhi's Garage for mechanical issues Barter Bob's Lost Camp Supplies for Gear

name: Artech
description: We are a hybrid art support-theme camp. We brought a giant unicorn named #Kokon to the Playa. At our camp, we host stand-up comedy evenings and open mic nights featuring comedians from the CIS region, performing in Russian, Ukrainian, and English. We unite people through laughter and art, creating an unforgettable experience for all participants.

name: Artery Pavilion
description: The ARTery is the headquarters of the Burning Man Art Department on playa, located at 6:30 and Esplanade in Black Rock City. It functions as a hub for information about art, as well as a check-in and resource center for artists, helping to  facilitate the placement and installation of their art on the playa during the Burning Man event.

name: A Shack of Sit
description: Would you like to go down the rabbit hole into infinity? Do you feel like belting out a song?  Are you looking for a great spot to sit, grab some cold water, and watch the world go by while getting your nails painted, or your hair braided? Are you looking for the Mensa Camp? We will be waiting for you at 9:45 & Esplanade.

name: Ashram Galactica
description: The Grand Hotel | Your Home Away From Home Away From Home Located Directly Above the Center of the Earth

name: Astral Headwash
description: Washing your dusty heads since 1998. Missed you and can't wait to hug you again! After all, the best hugs are wet hair hugs.

name: Astral Lab
description: Lose yourself in a reverie of music. An intimate sound camp for people who like good, unique music to jam out to. Feel like taking a break? Come watch forgotten films from the VHS era on a large format screen with high quality sound. Or kick back in our furry, air-conditioned VR lounge and explore some crafted spaces. Or take a seat, have a drink, and discuss the day's explorations in our shaded bar and lounge.

name: Astral Outpost
description: Astral Outpost is a place where the ethereal meets the earthly. We invite you to transcend the ordinary and explore the depths of the cosmos. At Astral Outpost, you may encounter a diverse array of beings - stargazers, scientists, engineers, activists, spiritual seekers and cosmic voyagers. Engage in thought-provoking dialogues during our Salon Talks or simply bask in the company of like-minded souls as you enjoy a curious ice cream crafted to awaken your senses and ignite your imagination. Whether you're delving into astral projection or simply seeking a refuge on your journey, Astral Outpost offers a sanctuary where the boundaries between the physical and metaphysical blur, and the journey of self-discovery knows no bounds. Join us as we embark on a voyage through the cosmos.

name: Astro Cats
description: We invite all burners to chill at the Flying Saucer Lounge with special cocktails during the day, and hot or cold sake or premium Tequila at the Dragon Lounge at night. You can enjoy acrobatic, fire dancing performance and workshops at scheduled times, and a place to practice and spin fire with us.  If you want to join our kitties for morning yoga or a afternoon tandem running race, bring your mat to stretch and pose with us You can chill on our chairs and watch people pass by while sipping our special drinks. You can learn to be a puppet master and perform at our Improv Puppet Theatre. You can challenge yourself to walk the plank, or play the game of Giant Jenga, or play poker at our game table while enjoying your sake. Yes, we also invite your for our theme dance parties!

name: Astropups
description: Fun, Frisky, and Fabulous! Exploring the Playaverse one Open Heart at a time.

name: ASTRO SHACK JaVa JoINt
description: Delicious coffee served in a cool space with extraordinary hospitality. Fresh ground French press dark roast brewed black as the depths of interstellar space itself (BYO creamer if you must adulterate). The hangout for quasi-legal alien beatniks, mutant cyborg gear heads, trans-solar scooter gangs, radical anarchist raypunks, neuroatypical geeks, freaked-out psychonauts, and caffeine fiends of every stripe.

name: Ataraxia
description: Chill. Laugh. Dance.

name: Atlantis
description: The demigods of Atlantis invite dusty desert travelers to relax at our mystical shaded and fanned oasis. Our mischievous hosts will offer up savory treats to our guests in hopes they might become enchanted by the oasis and never leave. We invite our new friends to join us each afternoon in bacchanalian festivals and indulge in rituals of song and dance. Once the sun sets, mysterious lights illuminate the caves of Atlantis which reward nocturnal travelers with sweet treats and interactive surprises.

name: Atom Cult
description: Cool yourself down with a variety of Fission Ice Cream offerings at noon! Fill yourself with Happiness and Joy while exploring the magnificent Garden of Earthly Curiosities! Relax and recharge both yourself and your portable electronics in our Reactor Dome! Enjoy the view of the Playa from our Clock Tower!

name: Atomic Pussy Photo Lounge
description: Come visit what is easily the 3rd best Bar/Lounge and Photo Booth on the playa. We serve ice-cold beverages to fuel your Curiosity and propel you to a higher flow state. Returning this year is Weir(d) Wednesday, when we'll be serving up a hero dose of the Grateful Dead all afternoon. Also returning this year is our twin-tip, reverse camber Shot-Ski (for those playa face shots), the Elaine Benes Dance Experience (dance classes for dance-introverts) – and of course the photo booth, photo art, and photo gifts. Noon-6pm M-T-W-F and late night on Thursday. Lounge space is 24 hrs.

name: A Transformation Station
description: Explore, Engage, Evolve: Transformation Amidst the Magic of Burning Man. Discover a world where transformative experiences and interactive art merge to create a sanctuary of healing, reflection, and communal celebration. Dive into classes or workshops during the day and co-create collective narratives that envision a future of interconnectedness and environmental consciousness. Join us to embrace a journey of self-discovery, connection, and personal growth, set against a backdrop of music, meditation, and the magic of shared experiences!

name: At the Oasis
description: A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent with keyhole openings that houses a chill space, 24/7 cold water and lemonade and jewelry making.

name: Aurora
description: Konnichiwa, pardner. Whether you're coming home from a long night in the saddle or just mounting up for the day, join us for a fresh bowl of ramen that'll soothe both body and soul. Sidle up to our cozy bar, share a tale with a stranger, and settle your spirit to the sweet sounds of smooth grooves.

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: Automatic Subconscious is back again with our 31 foot, fully climbable non geodesic diagrid gherkin complete with netting at the top. Come by and relax in the netting or catch a beer that we launch from the sky.

name: Avant Garden
description: We are a small Burning Man camp focused on creating community and connection both on and off Playa. We maintain a camp size of around 25 members, mostly based in the San Francisco/Bay Area. This year, we are bringing a two-part gift: Veg Out and The Brothel. Veg Out is our daytime gift, where we will be serving cool, fresh vegetables to overheated Burners. And at night, our Brothel will serve hot, steamy broth to people who want a cozy place to hang out and warm up.

name: Avocado "Toast"
description: Come enjoy a slice of avocado toast and a refreshing drink before heading out on the playa!

name: Awesomesauce
description: We are a Unicorn ranch decorated in bright fuchsia pink, lights and unicorns. We run an afternoon bar, called The unStable, with daily events, and serve our unique 'Unicorn Tears' drinks. We also have Awesomeball - large inflatable Zorb balls people can climb in and bash against each other.

name: Awesome!(ville)
description: Awesome!(ville) is the home of daily classes, fun spaces, live music, plenty of shenanigans and organized chaos. We'll teach you a new skill, find your hidden artsy talent, move and grove your body, and pour you a tasty cocktail. Kick back and enjoy artwork, new friends, and lots of laughs. We're here to celebrate just how AWESOME you can be!

name: Awkward & Tawdry Lounge
description: Part bar. Part lounge. Part sing. Part dance. Part chill. Part Shoot Your Balls Off. 100% Awkward & Tawdry.

name: BAAAHS Station
description: We're the home of BAAAHS: the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep. You might know us as the 40-foot long rolling disco whose entrance, naturally, is through the pulsing pink sphincter in the rear. Day and night, we graze on the playa — laser eyeballs shining, beloved DJs spinning, dancy people flocking. BAAAHS Station is our central depot where everyone is welcome to kick up your hooves. Come for our daily dance parties, get a view from our four-story watchtower, enjoy a lovely beverage from our friendly bartenders, and meet a homo or two. We're builders, artists, and techies at heart. Our DJ line-up combines world-famous names with up-and-cumming performers, with a focus on featuring queer artists. Our mission? Shear queer bliss.

name: Baalam
description: We are a dynamic camp, open to meeting you and welcoming you with a big hug, a smile and inviting you to spend a pleasant time with us.

name: Back To Camp
description: Back To Camp is a summer camp oasis in the hot dust of Black Rock City. Come on down for daily movement classes, themed cocktail parties, and our signature arts 'n crafts postcard program. We serve food too! You'll know us by the kitschy camp decor and Playatech pine trees.

name: Baconeers
description: Come visit the Baconeers for BACON, BOOZE and BEATS! 4 huge parties featuring 90's Hip-Hop, break-beats, funk and more. We're cooking up more than 300 pounds of bacon this year, so come get your fix. The new game plaza will have offer some weird and exciting fun. Evening videos, karaoke and periodic bacon sightings!

name: Bad Asstronauts
description: Welcome to the spaceport where queer Asstronauts from Denver and San Francisco will take care of all your musical needs. Our DJs will blow your mind with electrifying beats on our upgraded sound system and DJ booth to bring you an incredible new audio visual experience. Quench your thirst with our extraordinary elixirs crafted by our skilled mixologists at the Moontang Bar. Step into our all-new chill lounge, the Planetarium, where you can find tranquility while gazing at celestial wonders projected onto the dome above.

name: Bad Boy's Discover Your Kinks
description: Introductions to BDSM for the Vanilla but Curious and those new to the Kink community

name: Bad Burners Crew
description: Doin it wwwrongg so youse dont hafta!  Come see our moop museum and sip on some hot soup before your night of extravaganza.  Learn how to rescue Lady Environment and her playa people from the evils of Dr. Moop and the Hydrocarbons.

name: Bad Education
description: Our multicultural miseducators are committed to providing love, creativity, nourishment and a complete uneducation to all the beautiful students and members of the BRC community. We will be providing a Breaducation of the yummiest, most carbohydrate-y kind. From Monday to Friday 10am to 2pm, we will be serving warm, fresh baked bread with a variety of delicious/nutritious spreads, ensuring that all students start their school day off right. All are welcome & invited to our UnProm and Homecoming Dance on Sunday and Wednesday evenings, The punch will be spiked and the music fun and flowy, ask your crush to dance or makeout behind the bleachers, we won't tell the PTA. This is your official hall pass to let us shower you with miseducation, love, music and carbs so c'mon by!

name: Bad Idea
description: Welcome to the Bad Idea, where we proudly present the Thumberdome! Picture a tiny cage filled with contestants in equally tiny costumes, ready for the ultimate test of strength – thumb wrestling! Join scheduled tournaments, craft miniature costumes, or attend thumb wrestling workshops. Stay alert for spontaneous challenges and special appearances by renowned thumb wrestlers. Embrace the absurdity, laughter, and warmth of our camp – whether you're a participant or spectator, there's never a dull moment at Bad Idea!

name: badlands
description: Badlands is a live music open jam camp. Formed in 2011, we have always had a drum kit (or 3), amps, guitar, bass, keys, and a PA with microphones available for anyone that wants to come by and play. All levels of musicianship (within reason haha) are welcome!! We are open from 1-5 Mon-Fri and oftentimes have random night jams too! We have topless bartenders and bottomless drinks at our bar and a comfy shaded area with games and couches to relax, enjoy music and get out of the sun.

name: Baggage Check
description: Check your Emotional Baggage with us and Posit a Curious Pondering! By writing down your emotional baggage you don't have to carry it with you; use that freed up emotional headspace to cultivate and connect with your curious-side, because nearly everything is not as it first seems! We'll turn your emotional baggage into ashes and celebrate your newfound self-actualization at the temple burn. Stop by any time of the day or night, lounge in our super comfy dome, treat yourself to our pamper station, get out of the sun, or join a dance party in progress. We have a full slate of events every day - whether it's a Disco Line Dance, giant Cuddle Puddle, Consent Workshop, Hypnotising Eye-Gazing Session, or a Topsy Turvy Happy Hour - we have something for you and welcome all with open arms!

name: Bag o' Dicks
description: Free spirited camp with good beats, booze, and the friendliest bag o' dicks around! Look for the big LED dicks in the sky and come say hi. A bag o' dicks isn't always a bad thing, come check out our dicks and judge for yourself.  Come warm up your dick by our bonfire most nights or early mornings.

name: Ballistic Bubbles
description: Ballistic Bubbles, mutant peace tank that blows bubbles not bombs.

name: Banana Hammocks
description: Banana Hammocks is back with 1000000000% more sex-a-PEEL Relax and chill on one of our many hammocks, enjoy the relaxing beats of our DJs. Hydrate yourself at our Hydration station or lose your inhibitions at our DE-hydration station. Hop our our Art Car! The Dusty Busty!

name: Bao Chicka Wow Wow
description: Visit Bao Chicka Wow Wow to taste our bao (dim sum buns)! Fill your belly with our fresh and delicious steamed-to-order pork, red-bean, and custard bao. Hours: Brunch: 11am - 2pm (MON, TUES, WED) Far East Night Market:  7pm - 1am (WED)

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Get pampered at Barbie Day Spa: Fingernail painting, foot soaks, foot massage, body wash, erotic massage, cold drinks.

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Barbie Death Village is a delight to the eyes and the mind. Our camp features the Infamous Barbie Art - 1500 Barbies marching into a giant EZ-Bake Oven (Time set at 4:20, Temp on hi. Getting baked!). Barbie's street fronts are full of a range of interactivity! Swim up to our Barbie Swim Up Bar for a drink, enjoy our artistic Barbie-based silliness, stay for one of our many events which range from Pewter Casting, Bob Ross Painting, Liquid Light Show, Midnight Toast, Pancake Pork-out, and so much more. Keep an eye out for and take a ride on our beloved Mutant Vehicle: The Barbie Whorehouse (It is not just a Whorehouse, it is a Whore Home.)

name: Barbots
description: Barbots mobilize! Where Cyborg Volterra oversees the camp--but you get to push the buttons! Peaking on Thursday at 4 with Alice-In-Robotland main event, our schedule is a collection of day-spa, champagne saber lessons, karaoke, and nooks and crannies with all sorts of curious offerings all week. It'll have you thinking... "Oh yeah I remember these guys." With some new tricks up our sleeves, bring it on over to Barbots 2024!

name: BAR MACTROPOLIS
description: We are a full service Bar.  All are welcome.   In the morning we serve coffee, extra libation, and blood Mary's!  For the rest of the day and evening, come on by for a blended drink that you can blend with our custom made blender, or enjoy a cocktail or beer. Our music is chill and our bartenders the best!

name: Base Camp
description: Home and landing pad for the Metro Chop mutant vehicle.   A working camp where stuff gets done so the Black Rock City can have some fun.

name: Bat Haus
description: Art support camp for Am I Better Yet? Come take your photo in our face in a hole photo ops!

name: Battle Born Burners
description: Vintage Nevada Themed Bar and Casino -  Come Play, Drink and lounge with us.  The Bar with Nevadatude!  BRC's only Casino! High-end Cocktails, Entertainment, Gambling and other sillyness! The Loosest Sluts on the playa.  BRC's most liberal blackjack table!

name: Bearwhalea
description: They frame the wildest theories upon the most irrelevant facts, or upon the merest fancies. Mr. Darwin thinks that whales may be bears which have enormously increased their bulk, washed their paws into fins by constant swimming, and stretched their mouths by keeping them open to catch insects in the water. So also he thinks that men and women may have been developed out of monkeys, monkeys out of mushrooms, and mushrooms out of " monads," or little clots of jelly. Where is the proof? Where is a single instance of a bearwhale, or a man-monkey, to be seen? Of course there is not one.

name: Beats 'n Deets
description: Don't lose your shit when you lose your shit. Label it first at Beats 'n Deets. We make labels for all your stuff with a mug shot style photo with you and your camp details on it making it easy for people to return it to you or easy to find at lost and found. And it's a great souvenir. We are also home to AccaPlaya, a 6 piece jazz acapella singing group and Professor Dr Lumington and her Medicine Wagon to cure your ills. Come join us for drinks, specialised in NA drinks, in our circus tent with animated projections on the wall and some of the most underrated DJ's on the playa.

name: Beaverton
description: Camp Beaverton is an intentional, experimental, and experiential Burning Man community theme camp. We are a group of queer women/trans/genderqueer/lesbian/bisexual/heterosexual/etc... or folks who are simply as wayward as the playa is dusty. We celebrate sexuality, self exploration, and respect for one's journey through this life. Our goal is to provide a safe(r) space for queer women and trans folks on and off-playa. We encourage education, participation, inquiry, conversation, and self-reflection. We extend our goals to the greater Black Rock community by hosting workshops and social events.

name: B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse
description: Welcome to the B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse! Our camp is dedicated to promoting consent culture at Burning Man by ensuring every theme camp has a BEDucator. We believe in the importance of education and empowerment when it comes to fostering a safe and consensual environment on the playa. Our team of passionate volunteers is committed to providing information and resources to help every camp create a respectful and inclusive space for their participants. Join us in our mission to make Burning Man a place where consent is prioritized and respected by all.

name: Bedouins of Freedom
description: Bedouins of Freedom Crowd of free people Lectures, seminars, discussions Djs, music, performances Russians, Ukrainians, Americans Many interesting speakers and guests

name: BEER30
description: Voted Best Beer on the playa 6 years running! Maybe some seltzer or kombucha as well. Shade. Carpet. Seating. Conversation. Scheduled opening M, W, F 11AM-3PM. Other days hours vary.

name: BeeYond!
description: BeeYond: We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more, indeed moving BeeYond: Bees! We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing. We seek to inspire, proselytize, and lead by spreading our love and care for our fair Black Rock City. This shows in our efforts to be a clean green camp, in the way we BUZZ people (imagine a buzzing vibrating swarm!) in the way we welcome all passersby into our NectarSector to escape the sun or onto our Mutant Vehicle the Red Hot Beverly and most of all how we love each other and all we meet!

name: Be Less Gross
description: Are you tired of being gross? We have your important answers, adventurous quests, and can offer the comfort of a gently used mullet. BE LESS GROSS with us. We will conjure supernatural, psychomagical experiences individually designed for you.

name: Be ROCK City
description: This is where you lost yourself in an uncontrollable-body-shaking-frenzy of ROCK 'N' ROLL, surrendering to your alter ego that loves to shred solos on broom sticks, belt into dildos on mic stands, slam out the keyboard section on ironing boards as you look over to see your drummer swallowed by the crowd, now surfing. WE WILL get you ROCK hard performances by night, where YOUr crew are the stars of the show, potential winners of the Battle of the Prop Bands.

name: Best Butt
description: Camp Best Butt is dedicated to the relentless appreciation and promotion of all things buttocks related. How do you achieve the Best Butt? It's 90% confidence and 10% squats.

name: Better With Butter
description: Butter my buns and call me a biscuit. Have you ever watched butter melt in a pan in anticipation? Spread a rather large chunk on toast? Avoided your high cholesterol to have it? Used it for something naughty? Whatever your relationship is with butter, we want to know.

name: Beverly Grillz
description: The playa's home for exotic meats and wacky beatz. We believe in radical inclusion and invite you to participate in our love and nourishment.

name: BigAssWaffles
description: Serving up BigAssWaffles and drinks for breakfast and lunch

name: Big Bitty Litty Committee
description: Litty energy with Big Bitty vibes, come hang out and join a Committee of like minded funky individuals.

name: Big Booty Love
description: We like big boots and we cannot lie! Visit us, don't be shy! Come dust off your boots at Camp BBL to see our boot themed art and curated boot rack!

name: Big Ding Energy
description: Big Ding Energy has finally made it to the Playa to provide wind wing lessons to the citizens of Black Rock City. We couldn't find a truck big enough to bring a lake but learning how to wing on a variety of wheeled vehicles is going to be just good enough. Love speed and adrenaline? Hate having skin on your knees? Come on by for daily wing lessons and bacon grilled cheese. Stretching and warmups will be provided so come by early and make sure your fit and ready to rip!

name: Bike Gods
description: Bike trouble got ya down? Come visit the Bike Gods, where we practice self reliant bike repair 24 hours a day. Our camp features 8 fully equipped workstations and spare parts. We have caring and compassionate bike mechanics to assist you M-F 10am-12pm. Out on the Playa, look for our Bike Gods Taxi Service running yellow tandems and our famous Lanterne Rouge art car.

name: Billy Madison's Tent
description: Come and experience Billy Madison's Tent! Fun hangout with drinks, food and karaoke. Come in, make friends, party or just pretend to be Billy Madison for a while. All are welcome!

name: Bing
description: Start the day with the rich aromas of freshly brewed coffee from around the world. Camp Bing is an interstellar cafe and hangout where baristas from countless planets unite to share their home planet's quintessential morning ritual - the perfect cup of joe. Come and chill with us.

name: Bioluminati (Bike Mutation)
description: Unadorned cyclists beware-- The Style Enforcement Officers will be back in person in the dust to issue citations for kinetic-aesthetic violations! But fear not: the Bioluminati Bike Mutation Station - is THE destination for bicycle decoration and transformation. We gift all manner of non-moopagenic materials and accoutrements for mutating your mobile mount into something magnificent! We are open Monday through Friday from 11-4ish hosting interactive bike decorating activities.  We have a spray paint area, lots of duct tape, toys, dolls, barbies, non-moopy materials, all helping to make the playa a more fun and colorful place to be! On Tuesday night, we will have a night bike DANCE PARTY!! with lights to decorate bikes and a DJ On Saturday a.m. we will be having a bike mutation ride parade!

name: Birth-Day Camp
description: Come celebrate your Birth-Day with us. We are throwing a Birth-Day party with the '70s, '80s, '90s hits for you to practice your Radical Self-Expression. Dance your way up to our bar for your Birth-Day Vodka shot and receive a gift. And if you came in your Birth-Day suit, you've earned a double shot or 2 gifts. We will also be hosting a game of Naughty Pornhole and Pin the Tail on Whatever or Whoever while you listen to the music on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday. Join us on Friday night for a Neon lights Birth-Day party. We will be hosting the best dressed Curiouser and Curiouser Theme and gifting a prize.

name: Bitchin' Braid Camp
description: Come for the braids, stay for the bar parties. Please grab a partner or find one in the braiding lounge to make a plan for a style that will last the week. Braiders on hand with all the supplies and skills to get you taken care of, including mirrors to check out your sweet self on the way out. No hair? NO PROBLEM. From 10am to sunset we have have hosted bar parties, new faces, new specialty drinks, new outfits and new music every two hours. Want to be apart of our camp's 10 year tradition, head over right before sunset to grab a bevy and enjoy a special treat as the sun starts kissing those mountains. Miss you already, so swing by.

name: Bitchin Deepthroats and Backshots
description: Bitchin Noodle Shop is coming with its alter egothis year, Bitchin Deepthroats and Backshots! Come and show off your throat goat skills in our dildo jousting competition! Too much to swallow? Then come enjoy a refreshing tickleback shot and come get your hair braided by our playa experts.

name: Bite Me Oasis
description: Bite Me Oasis offers a vibrant community experience at Burning Man, featuring our interactive art installation "Booty Bite" and a mutant art car providing food and drinks on the playa. "Booty Bite" invites playful engagement with a refreshing water splash, while our mutant art car serves hot dogs, ramen, and cold drinks during early morning and late-night excursions. We prioritize Radical Self-reliance, Communal Effort, and Leave No Trace principles to foster a responsible and inclusive community environment. Join us for immersive experiences and communal adventures at Burning Man.

name: Black Hole Literary Society
description: COME PLAY!! Grow old, not up. By day rest in our shady lounge and hydrate, color, knit and talk. After dark, lose yourself in our 3-D black-light experience! Come flow to some vibey tunes, create a visual masterpiece on our Giant Lite Bright installation, and warm yourself at our campfire. Join us till late on Thursday night for 'Elvis Hour' around 8pm followed by a night of music with words through the decades and psychedelic rock. Friday we welcome ALL for our annual Shabbat potluck at sundown - bring some food to share or simply come and enjoy! We dig high fives, interpretive dance, and hula hoops, meaningful conversation and (bad dad) jokes. WELCOME HOME! We've missed you. Let's play.

name: Black Roc City Piano Bar
location: Delight & 4:30, Man side: In EBB and Glow Village
description: Afternoon jams, evening live music, and cool drinks

name: Black Rock Academy
description: We are often approached at Camp Black Rock Academy with the question of, "So what do you guys teach?" Personally, I dont think the important question is, "What do you guys teach?" But rather, I would follow up with, "What are you willing to learn?"

name: BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES BUS STOP!
description: Providing accessible Playa tours in our adventure rig, with room for about 10 - 16 Burners, leaving from our BUS STOP! art installation on the Playa. Tours go daily at 9am, return you to the BUS STOP! and last about 2hrs. Or meet us at camp prior to the tour! Contact us for info about special tours and pick ups/drop offs. If you are interested in camping with us or driving tours please contact us. To find our camp - look for tall grey feather flags with a big " ! "on them! or check the website for our location closer to the Burn. Come ride with us!

name: Black Rock Beacon
website: http://www.blackrockbeacon.org Location: Fascinate & 5:30, Mountain side: Look for the Wonder Bread Trailer
description: Newspaper, 3+ editions during burn week, find Beacon Boxes at BMIR,  Playa Info, and Center Camp

name: Black Rock Boutique
description: The Black Rock Boutique is your fashion headquarters at Burning Man since 1996. We empower Burners to creatively self-express with funky, freaky, furry, fabulous clothing. Come find a new outfit, donate your dusty old playawear, mutate your clothes into something new and weird, and strut your stuff on our runway! Open 12-5pm Monday-Saturday of Burn Week.

name: Black Rock Cinemas
description: Black Rock Cinemas is pleased to announce that "The Playa Film Festival" has arrived. We have curated a selection of short films to entertain, amuse, challenge, inspire, educate and otherwise get the conversation kicked up a notch. Our 75-minute screenings are followed by an After Party you won't want to miss with drinks and popcorn. Be sure to add your "Sandprints" to our outside theatre walls and cast your vote for our "Burner Choice Awards." Every day is a new selection of 4-6 short films. Come enjoy a show in our cinema tent, or at one of our two street theatres. Check our web site for showtimes and Special Events We are here to interact with you and present the Playa's most underrepresented art form: film. Come play with us.

name: Black Rock City Aquarium
description: Choose whether to be a visitor or an exhibit! Props provided. Regular feedings. Exit through the gift shop.

name: Black Rock City Chicken Ranch
description: Interactive rubber chicken playhouse

name: Black Rock City Municipal Court
description: Join us for Court! Whether you're looking for legal information, know your rights trainings, or to simply grab a drink and talk to a tired attorney stop on by!

name: Black Rock City Municipal Pool
description: Looking for a place to cool down and relax? The Black Rock City Municipal Pool might be the place for you! There's something for everyone: come by for a refreshment at one of our Open Swim sessions, bike in after sunset for one of our movie nights, or put your dancing boots to good use at our Spring Break party! Access to our Spa is only available for members, so stop by our Membership Office and fill out your application. Want to book the pool for your next event? Reach out with a request and let's make a splash together!

name: Black Rock City Passport Office
description: Your adventure awaits! Explore Black Rock City! Record your journey! We provide playa passports you can get stamped at various camps to record your travels. Visit your favorite camps and discover new ones!

name: Black Rock City's Cleanest Camp
description: Black Rock City's Cleanest Art Car

name: Black Rock City Tea Company
description: Enjoy a hot or cold cup of fine tea and engaging conversation in our calming Tea Salon, and participate in a Tea Ceremony led by our enlightened Tea Masters. In the late afternoon sing along during Human Karaoke with our famous songstress and her 300 tune songbook. Our tea bartenders are pleased to add libations to tea for guests of legal drinking age.

name: Black Rock City Welding & Repair
description: Welding, repair, adjustment and general tinkering help. Come on over to use our tools to repair your stuff or get our help repairing what's broke.  We repair bikes and all sorts of other things.  Enjoy an adult beverage at Crowbar our shaded walk up and sit down Bar.

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
description: Black Rock Disc Golf Club has a mushroom-themed disc golf course which embraces fun, games, friendly competition, collaboration, and creativity. We provide a place where folks can join together and throw one of the custom stamped discs loaned out at the camp. You can win one at one of our tournaments or events! The course is accessible 24/7, and discs glow in the dark so don't hesitate to swing by late night/early morning for a round. We also have some mushroom hazards on the course! We have tall ones, small ones, ones that glow, and ones that show you what disc golf is all about. It's definitely a psychedelic experience to walk through, even if you aren't in the mood to play a round. Just make sure to listen for the call of, "FORE!"

name: Black Rock French Quarter
description: Welcome to the bayou! Home of the infamous Golden Cafe cocktail lounge, ubiquitous Cafe de la Fin du Monde coffee house, legendary Black Rock Bakery, elusive Lonesome Gator Gumbo Cookery, subterranean Black Rock Wine Cellar, fermented and pickled Swine and Brine, and ever apologetic Domeakase sushi bar. Your home for elevated drinking, fine dining, and boring stories about the old days, since 2003!

name: Black Rock Labs The Expanse
description: Black Rock Labs is a Civic Support camp focused on testing/scaling/messaging climate smart regenerative technologies at Black Rock City and the Regionals. Black Rock Labs hosts a daily  1-hour Sustainability Talk Series at 2 pm and a Playa-wide tour on the Abraxas art car at 4 pm  on Thursday to view BRC's expanding deployment of renewables and regenerative climate smart activities.

name: Black Rock Observatory Theme Camp
description: Black Rock Observatory is a mobile astronomical observatory dedicated to showing people just how amazing the universe is. Started at Burning Man in 2014, we have expanded beyond the borders of Black Rock City to educational institutions and events all along the West Coast.

name: Black Rock Piano Lounge
description: Black Rock Piano Lounge is the place to come and share your talent with a friendly audience. We bring great musicians to the playa but build our lounge for that spontaneous moment where the perfect vocals are combined with the best tuned pianos on the playa. Lets make some beautiful music together.

name: Black Rock Piano Lounge Annex
description: Black Rock Piano Lounge is the place to come and share your talent with a friendly audience. We bring great musicians to the playa but build our lounge for that spontaneous moment where the perfect vocals are combined with the best tuned pianos on the playa. Lets make some beautiful music together.

name: Black Rock Public Library
description: There once were some folks from afar, Whose love of books knew no bar. They visited a library so remote, In search of good quotes, And they left with improved repertoire.

name: Black Rock Realty
description: We welcome anyone who's ever wanted to own property at Black Rock City! We'll be sharing our knowledge on solar & sustainability and cruising the playa in the 'Beach House' that's available for sale to the highest non monetary bidder.

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description: Every city has a roller skating rink. The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink for Blac Rock City. We ae a full service roller rink.  We have the skates, the funky music and we're always a funky good time every time.

name: Black Rock Sauna Society
description: Experience the essence of Finnish sauna culture amidst the Playa's embrace. Our camp offers invigorating sauna sessions, traditional löyly rituals, and the chance to encounter real life sauna elves! Join us for communal relaxation, deep connection, and the transcendent warmth of the Northern spirit.

name: Black Rock Socks
description: Come by for Chocolate Roulette, Tea and Shock Collar Karaoke for a magical time

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
website: http://blackrocktravelagency.com Location: Airport Road None None
description: The Black Rock Travel Agency is a gang of pilots, aviation enthusiasts, and adventurers who come together every year to serve the airport village and its visitors located at the end of Point5. Yes, there is an airport! BRTA makes it just like you imagine a Burning Man Airport would be. A massive Starport pyramid structure with entertainment and bar underneath with 30 foot viewing platform above? Yes! A super yummy galley serving pancake breakfast and bbq? Yes! Facilitating scenic airplane flights for Burners? Of course! The Agents at the Black Rock Travel Agency are committed to burners having an experience only to be found at the best airport in the world. Start, continue or end your journey with us.

name: Black Rock University
description: Black Rock University teaches Playa Survival Skills and Best Practices. The 10 Principles of Burning Man. 10 Principles of Couples Survival and other Playa Centric courses and outreach.

name: Blank Slate
description: Camp Blank Slate will repair your bike day or night, provide sounds to get you to move your feet, drinks to wet your whistle, and insults that'll remind you of when Burning Man was cool again. Come on by for a history lesson into Burning Man, and learn about our founder, Larry David!

name: Blazing Death Ship
description: Join the legendary Death Ship at its home camp, where an interdimensional Viking feast hall awaits weary travelers.  Join us for  libations and savor slow-cooked pit barbecue at dusk-ish, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, or just ride with us out on playa.

name: BLD
description: BLD - Crossword puzzles and word games, Swiss Space cow racing, drinks, and psychic and tarot readings.

name: BlinkingManCamp97
description: ART 20 / IQ Test / Dragnet Interrogation...WE do it all! Come and visit the trash fence and see our 13th project on the fence. There will be 75 tennis rackets adorned with fun recycled folk art pieces. In camp we will give you an IQ Test with wacky question and expect fun weird answers. Also we can interrogate you using sound bite from the old Dragnet TV/Radio show. Always fun this is my 20th visit to BRC and always bring the fun!

name: Blinky Things Hospital
description: Shit breaks on the playa. Electronic shit super breaks. Did you bring a full repair shop? No? Good news - we did. Come to camp MVC and our Blinky Things Hospital to leverage the tools, voltmeters, and engineering talent you need to troubleshoot your ride, exhibit or playa gifts and, hopefully, get it fully functional again. MVC is staffed by the creators of the eight-foot, LED illuminated, motorized, sound-infused Burner Boards (surfboards) you may have seen riding across the playa…. You might even get a ride! But no, we're not going to build you or sell you a board.

name: Blue CATerpillar
description: Come to the Wonderland Hookah Lounge to enjoy Tribal/Shamanic beats, herbal teas, cool smoothies and a variety of games like Backgammon, Chess, Checkers, Dice Poker, Spy, The Hat, Catan, CodeNames, UNO, etc. For those looking for more active entertainment we have a 15' trampoline and foosball, so put your best foot forward!

name: Blue Lotus Chinese Camp
description: Located at 5:50 & J

name: Body Shop
description: At the Body Shop, we believe bodies require regular maintenance. Our shop is a whimsical place where the worn down burner can relax their mind, refresh their body, and enjoy themselves for a bit before continuing on their journey. In the style of an auto-body repair shop, we are staffed with friendly mechanics ready to appraise, repair, and certify all of the bodies on the playa. Guests will enjoy a full gamut of traditional tune-ups reimagined for the human body: buffing, lubrication, oil change, painting, fueling, and waxing. We look forward to servicing you!

name: Bohemian Forest
description: Art is our life! We invite you to our Bohemian Forest - where our artists will create a forest of incredible beauty, our dj will play selected house music, and musicians will arrange unforgettable live performances)! And yes, we cook dumplings for you! To make your tummy happy!!! Bohemian Forest is a light that cuts through space in time, leaving behind a story called Life!

name: Boom Boom Womb
description: Boom Boom Womb is your feminine, funky, soulful, childlike home away from home on the playa.

name: Boonville Camp
description: Join us at our Love Lounge: a place to join a meditation, have some tea and tarot, or just chill out. We invite you to join us for our Thursday night Cabaret: an old-school spontaneous talent show.

name: Boots & Cats
description: Join us for afternoon kom"boot"cha and dance yourself clean on our life-size cat play house, Catopia. You won't want to miss this view! For our creative cats, decorate your boots and make pasties (we'll provide DIY supplies). On Wednesday, we honor all boobs in a Boobs & Cats kombucha party, aka "Titty Takeover". Missing your cat or furry friend at home? Write them a message and we'll mail it after the burn!

name: Booty Kitchen
description: Booty Kitchen is a community of  friendship-homies geared towards being homie-friends in a food-centric type of "FEED ME NOW" way that transcends bounds unless the bounds end up being barriers in which case it doesn't matter anyways.

name: Booty Worship
description: Allow us to worship you. Your ass is our asset. Booty Worship is a place where you can: Feel safe to be exactly as you are Explore your edges Embrace your queerness Move your divine, sexy body Scale our play structures, decked out with a space net, lyra, silks, pole, and great views of BRC. Move your body to our balanced curation of ass-shaking rhythms and cosmic obscurities. We serve the best cocktails this side of Center Plaza at our Booty Bar, and boast the hottest barstaff to boot. Dress-up at our beloved Booty Boutique! Not your average thrift rack – our selection is vetted and makeup flourishes are dispensed with skill by our stylists, so you can look and feel your best. Participate in an afternoon workshop! Offerings include: tantric practices, guided movement, and interpersonal skills.

name: Bounce Block
description: Welcome to Bounce Block! Come Bounce in our Bounce House culdesac and relax in our shaded couch zone! Spontaneous DJ sets and party vibes Press the dynamite box to see what happens and get a Scooby smooch if your lucky!

name: Box of Wonders
description: Box of Wonders. Come and interact with the magic of our art car every evening. Join us during the day for our special « Do it like a Roman ». Charging station every evening, music and deliciousness every day !

name: Brain Freeze Camp
description: We will be back again in 2023 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.

name: Brainiac
description: Brainiac Mutant Vehicle

name: Brand-ur-Ass N More
description: Brand-Ur-Ass N More will stimulate your entire being -- from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin' post and get a temporary brand. Do some cock ropin' and belly up to the saloon. Bathe in sound at the evening gong baths. Feel the vibrations of the playa, hear the harmonic frequencies and allow your mind to wander. Find something/give something at the Giving Tree, and hitch a ride on our vehicles. Y'all come N play!

name: Brasa: Brazilian Bodega
description: Experience a Brazilian bodega ("boteco"). Here you will find delicious veggie BBQ, "caipirinhas" (cocktails), great music and joyful people. We welcome you to sit, take it slow and enjoy the "boteco life".

name: BRC3PO (BRC 3:00 Post Office)
description: Set in a giant rural postbox, the Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services up to 16 hours per day. We offer authentic, one-on-one, creative interactions that range from the side-splittingly silly to the supremely sublime. We also provide an array of curated Burning Man postcards and postage to send those postcards anywhere in the world. Imagine the intersection of immersive improvisational theater, spontaneous talent show, soulful conversation, and stifling yet corrupt bureaucracy. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO -- YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO, if you pay us a visit!

name: BRC at BRC
description: Burner Rec Center at Black Rock City! Volleyball, Pickleball, Batting Cages, Corn hole, Tetherball and more...come battle it out on the court or cheer on the homies. ;)

name: BRC Hash House Harriers (BRCH3)
description: With members of the BRCH3 found in several camps across the playa, a group of us camp together in the Bike Repair Camp. Our mission: share hashing with BRC while keeping the beer cold and bikes running smoothly. Join us for a hash on the playa. In addition to our Annual Red Dress Run (Thursday, 3pm, meet at the man), we host a variety of hash activities and events. Check out our events page for more information! The BRCH3 pays homage to our roots as hashers as we encourage our wankers to live in harmony with the 10 principles of Burning Man while sharing our own hashy culture and community. The two overlap quite nicely!

name: BRC Raccoons
description: Well, as the loveliest trash pandas, we firmly believe that sustainability, alternative energy sources, as well as the 4Rs (Reuse, Reduce, Rethink, Recycle) are crucial in our daily human (and raccoon) lives. A raccoon can be crafty and resourceful, responsible and playful, but above all – curious and friendly.

name: BRC Ski Resort
description: With great powder comes great responsibility. Black Rock City Ski Resort's EXTRAterrestrial hosts welcome all earthlings to join us for in the apres-ski experience of a lifetime. Send it on the dance floor with Frosty the Snowman Discoball and our iconic DJs, kick it and recharge in our luxurious hexayurt lounge, and get toasty at Starfucks coffee bar with the playa's finest cold brew and shot-skis.

name: BRC Snow Club
description: Welcome shredders! BRCSC is the home of the first (and only) ski slope on the Playa! Come ski, snowboard, or sled down our 60-foot long, multi-tiered hill and enjoy refreshment at our bar! New for 2024: Disco Sledding!

name: Breakagay Weepubedick
description: Espresso martinis and wine from 10-2 every day! Get yourself a new, better Playa Name from our drunk Playa Name Robot. Engage with Robie the Robot and interact with our phone booths.

name: Bright Cider Life
description: Come and join us from 4-6pm each afternoon for riotous cider drinking and English shenanigans. Wassailing Ceremony on Friday at Sunset. Come and watch the wonders of this ancient pagan celebration unfold before your very eyes.

name: Broken Compass
description: Lost at sea? On a boat without a paddle? Us too! Join Broken Compass for golden milk, workshops and more!

name: Brothers & Bourbon
description: "Brothers & Bourbon" is a Burning Man camp fostering mental health conversations over bourbon. Located on the event's outskirts, it provides a supportive space for men and allies. With embedded mental health practitioners, it offers therapy workshops, group discussions, and peer support circles. Embracing Burning Man's principles, it prioritizes inclusivity and communal effort. Through bourbon tastings, campfire chats, and creative sessions, it encourages authentic expression and meaningful connections. By integrating mental health awareness with community spirit, it aims to destigmatize mental health discussions and promote well-being.

name: Brulee
description: A Brûlée Tea Party.

name: BS BOOZE CRUZ
description: Slow water rafting on the Playa. Our camp includes the actual 24 barrel barge you will need and the characters that make up the crew. During the day, these characters will present off the wall instructional presentations.. Semi Pro DJ's will keep the vibe going under the sun but you can chill under the 40x40 shade structure. Choose your favorite float toy, some on top of coil springs, to rest your feet. At night the camp will feature a small campfire and 7pm to midnight music. Sit on our chairs and look at the stars under the blue camp lighting. The music theme will change daily. Of course we will serve at least one meal. It will be Elote, Mexican corn in a cup, on Tuesday. Bring your own spoon and cup.

name: Bubble Camp
description: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere and drops to drink for all. Dispensing thai iced tea and cold pressed coffee for all you parched playa peeps.

name: Bubble Lounge
description: Celebrating our 25th Anniversary, BubLo returns to BRC once again, bringing a place for shade, libations, and shenanigans!  Stop by for cold drink, a Quickie Body Wash, Music Healing, shade, funky stylings, and our newest addition... Playa Feud!  And of course, lotsa Bubbles!  A favorited camp by PEERS and that guy LH that we all miss, there's always a good time at our place on the playa!

name: Bubbles and Bass
description: Bubbles and Bass is a 100% volunteer run art and music collective that brings joy to burner events worldwide! Our goal is to provide a home conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, energetically. Best known for our sunrise to midday dancing revelry: more Bubbles and Bass makes the playa a magical place!

name: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome
description: Our mission is to share the principles of radically inclusive Buddhism and mindfulness with the playa - along with meditation, self-awareness, love and compassion for self and others. We also serve delicious coffee in our cheerful cafe to fuel your adventures.

name: Buddha Lounge
description: The Buddha Lounge is a healing and sound camp offering DJs, workshops, ecstatic dance, yoga, breath work and meditation.

name: Budju Oasis
description: Come for a refreshing drink and fresh fruit stick, stay for our entertaining company and to discover the secret pleasures of what it is to be and know a Budju.

name: Bumblepuss
description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the playa with the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas while you relax in the shade after your steam bath.

name: Bunny Meth Lab
description: BML is a place where all bunnies can exercise their darker side, the place of matted fur, of sharper teeth. We are the bunnies unafraid to carry rabbit feet so we don't lose the keys to our ever deeper and darker rabbit holes. We eat snakes. We devour foxes. We shit chocolate eggs.

name: BURBS
description: The Burbs is the ESD camp that hosts our fire suppression contractor and ESD volunteers.

name: Burner Brown
description: Great music, Great Mead, party games, dancing, and general shenanigans. We make janky look good!

name: Burner Buddies
description: We are a relaxed LGBTQI+ camp known for issuing Gay Cards, throwing the Gay Conversion Party to 'turn' people gay, and Genital Printmaking based on a traditional Japanese technique.

name: Burner Dojo
description: Burner Dojo is a home for sharing and learning a variety of martial arts styles on the playa, most notably Quantum Martial Arts from San Francisco/Seattle/Portland. We also offer daily classes in meditation, yoga, and even Kids Karate! Pinnacle events include a Kumite Battle and board breaking bonanza. Enter through the Torii Gate, kick off your shoes, wander through our Zen rock garden, share a cup of tea, and get in touch with the peaceful warrior within.

name: Burner Express Bus Depot
description: Burner Express Bus Depot for arriving and departing Burner Express buses.

name: Burners Without Borders (BWB)
description: Our camp in Black Rock City (BWB-BRC) is a physical manifestation of our mission and our community in the Black Rock Desert. We seek to bring together do-ers, makers, and change agents bringing the 10 principles to life beyond the orange trash fence. We do this by hosting a speaker series, a maker space, evening conversations around the fire-pit and supporting the participant-facing BRC sustainability teams like BLAST, RAT, and the Green Corridor. BWB promotes activities around the globe that support a community's inherent capacity to thrive by encouraging innovative approaches to disaster relief and grassroots initiatives that make a positive impact.

name: Burning Band Camp
description: Burning Band Camp! This is the home of the itinerant Burning Band, here to provide you with an earful of music. Well, two earfuls, really...

name: Burning Man Bike Course
description: Come test your skills on the Burning Man Bike Course! A bicycle obstacle course and pump track for all ages, abilities, genders, and sexual preferences. Look for our morning "Kids Only" hours and our world famous Nitro Circus Biketakular Demo and Competition!

name: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory
description: Interactive DIY BM designs. We supply the spray paint and BM stencils.  You supply the clothing, gear, or body to paint. Totally interactive, quick, easy, and fun.  Open 24/7.

name: Burning My Crêpe
description: Lighting up the Playa since 2018 with the best flamed crêpes you'll ever eat. Made from scratch by people from Brittany (crêpe's original birthplace), you'll be mesmerized by our pole dancers while enjoying our crêpes in our cozy living room!

name: Burning Questions
description: Burning Questions offers visitors an escape to a hammock world surrounded by nature. Here to provide you with a comfortable hang space day or night, come climb into our nets and let us take you away to the beach, the forest, or a field filled with our World Famous Crickets. We are a group of friends from around the globe who are excited to build our small sanctuary for you to enjoy!

name: BurningShip
description: "There are Wood Ships, there are Steel ships, but the best ships are FriendShips." A bunch of hippie shipmates from all over the world bring their FriendSHIP to the desert for a week of debauchery! Join us at BurningShip, a cruise ship full of immoral crew that's currently stranded in the desert! We'll be your BOOZE directors providing you with drinks, smiles, and fun events. Learn how to salsa dance, smoke a premium stogie, and find hidden 'Booty'! Come with no expectations and leave feeling full. Full of love, hugs, laughs, and WTFs. And most importantly long lasting Burning(friend)Ships.

name: Burning Sky
description: Skydivers over Burning Man. Come see Black Rock City from 9,000 feet in the air. Watch the skydivers exit the plane while you stay safely inside, and get an exciting ride back to the earth. Gifting rides Wednesday & Thursday 11a-5p.

name: Burnstream Court
description: Burnstream Court is a group of Airstream owners who recreate a 1960s trailer park, Black Rock City style.  We almost always have fun daytime events happening that you can join in with. And we give away grilled cheese sandwiches midday M-F.

name: Burntown
description: Don't call it a comeback, we been here for years! Burntown is back again ready to ROCK the playa. Come try the Rope Bridge of DEATH. Savor many exotic tobacco and herbal snuff varieties in our SNUFF Emporium. Shop for that special something in our General Store. Relax and enjoy our Art Gallery, which will have all sorts of artwork and guest speakers throughout the week. At Burntown, expect the unexpected!

name: Burthday
description: The most common birthdays are in August and September. Come born, reborn, and yet-to-be-born to celebrate your Burthday. Burning man and birthdays aren't mutually exclusive and you should be celebrated at both. Enter the Youterus and celebrate the day you entered this Curious world, with a party just for you, any and all yous welcome. But also for everyone else.

name: Cabaret of the Void
description: Cabaret of the Void is a variety show-style vaudevillian speakeasy featuring an intimate stage and bar offering wine and song and a bohemian-chic lounge for socializing and unwinding. Boasting a decadent aesthetic, red and purple velvet decor, and low-lit ambiance, our interactivity will focus on bringing the spirit of satire, performance art, and parody to the playa. Cabaret of the Void offers a dizzying array of burlesque, comedy, magic, dance, circus, music and more!

name: Cadillac Cramp Country Camp
description: Welcome to Cadillac Cramp Country camp! Where you can be refreshed daily between 1 and 6pm. Bring a friend you'd like to interrogate, if needed. Please join us for karaoke in the evening, and bones grilled up by Bones when the bbq is hot ! We love you !

name: Cafe Sua Da
description: Dusty, hot and tired? Come by Cafe Sua Da for a cafe sua da (Vietnamese Iced Coffee). Designed to look and feel like a cafe on the hot streets of Saigon, we welcome anyone and everyone to enjoy an iced cold shot of caffein dripped personally for you, topped off with a healthy dose of sweetened condensed milk. Open most afternoons during the week.

name: Caffeination Station
description: Full service fueling

name: Caffeine Oasis
description: Rise up, travelers, it's time to shine! Caffeine Oasis embraces the warmth and spirit of the Sun. We welcome you to gather with friends in our cozy space and enjoy freshly made sun tea and cold brew coffee every morning from 8 to 10. You can also use the heat of your body to transform magical thermochromic fabric into beautiful artwork that is both immediate and fleeting.

name: Cameltopia
description: You Look Thirsty! Welcome to Cameltopia, your desert oasis and refuge from the sun's heat. You are welcome to pet the camels but please do not feed the animals. Recharge your soul and fill your vessel with premium unleaded H20 at our post-apocalyptic "Route 66" gas station. Our attendants will refuel your canteen while you browse our Inconvenience Store. Monday-Friday 11AM-5PM Playa Standard Time. Wednesday afternoon is our annual "Hump Day" party with an eclectic mix of tail-shaking beats!

name: Camera Obscura Tribe
description: We invite you to the world of photography - from enrichment of visual experience to technical support and guidance: we do it all! Our camp is home for everyone - with or without cameras, photographers and just artists. As a service, we offer professional photography for everything, from playa weddings to personal sessions and public events - just ask!  We have a walk-in photobooth and plan various photo-related workshops.

name: Camp 3907
description: Welcome to Camp 3907! The beauty of Black Rock City is that we're all on equal ground--in fact, we're 3,907 feet above sea level and so are you! We are Elevators, here to Elevate your experience. Elevate yourself with our 12' tall Mood Swing! Come to explore the city on our 10', 3d topographic map with camps and art pieces supplied by you! We will gladly supply you with (mis) information while you have a drink at the bar, then browse our clothing boutique with all the latest fashions. Be sure to join in our classes including make your own Rope Man, followed by a dive into our expanded pit of 1000 rubber chickens!

name: Camp Akumal
description: The Best Shaved Ice and Rum Cocktails on Playa -- Come for the Concessions, Stay for the Vibes

name: Camp Alien Dick
description: Our camp offers a unique, extraterrestrial-themed experience highlighted by a three-story high inflatable alien with a distinctive feature, designed to draw attendees from afar to our engaging and inclusive space. Celebrations in the thematic area promise lively entertainment, refreshments, and a series of amusing games that playfully incorporate the alien anatomy motif. Complementing the vibrant atmosphere, we're distributing an alien-themed consent zine, emphasizing the universality of consent and respect, ensuring a welcoming environment for all adventurers.

name: Camp ASL Support Services HUB
description: Deaf centralized services for deaf needs/resources/services/faq

name: Camp Average AF !
description: Come Hang Out Guilt-Free 9:30 AM Monday to Friday - Yoga 8:30 PM Monday to Thursday- Night UV glow face and bodypainting + Fire spinning flow arts

name: Camp Beagle Scouts
description: Visit us for playa themed psychiatric advice or maybe some ADD-vice from Lucy and the rest of our camp. Now is your chance to finally kick the football!

name: Camp Bean Water
description: Beans, flicking, roasting, steamy dripping love, room for cream – our secret steps to the finest cup of coffee. Bring your brewtiful self over to Camp Bean Water to enjoy a cup and let us show you the full potential of a coffee shop. All cups of coffee our baristas serve-up are made to order and come with positive affirmations. Looking for something to fill your now stimulated colon, our cooks can fry you up mouth-watering arepas. Love and good vibes are abundant in our cafe, so drip on in. We're open every weekday morning. We have special evening events like arepa night and a special sunrise opening

name: Camp Be Bothered
description: We can't be bothered to fill this out.

name: Camp Best Year Yet
location: Hypnotic & 9:30, Man side: Look for the Sign!
description: The best year is now!!! Tayler, Jennie, Rachel, Alex, Sam, and John. Coffee every day at 8ish.

name: Camp Bird of Paradise
description: Camp Bird of Paradise is the support camp for the mutant vehicle Bird of Paradise. Our artistic theme is a cross between the Bird of Paradise Flower and a Mardi Gras parade float. The Bird of Paradise  provides access out to the playa art installations    We share or transportation with any and all denizens of Black Rock City ... Day and Night.
