description: HEROES WANTED for hazardous journey, constant danger, honor, and rewards, if you happen to succeed! Come to the Nightcrawlers camp to jump into this year's PlayaRPG, a week-long playa-wide adventure! Choose your class, receive your first quest, and share a drink with your fellow adventurers. It's up to you to save the day! The game continues throughout the entirety of the burn, so don't worry if you miss the kickoff party Monday night, you can still join by visiting the camp! Daily gaming hours Tues-Sat from 11:00-2:30pm, or whenever you see the "Heroes Wanted" sign out front. Be the hero you were meant to be!

name: Nipple Crime
description: Nipple crime is a Reno based theme camp dedicated to memorable experiences. Come have a drink at our extensive home-brewed bar while you decorate your Nipples. Friday's Sensual Hotdog eating contest is our biggest event and won't disappoint. We are mostly a day camp but often have small parties well into the morning.

name: No Bikini Atoll
description: We are a small camp of Big Island Hawaii based campers sharing aloha and Pāʻina Wai Niu coconut water parties and hydration.

name: Nobo House
description: Nobo House is an international, quirky Holistic Wellness & Recovery camp that is a place of refuge for playa adventurers, artists, & builders. Our gift is a chill playa spa, that includes a steam room, cold room, gym, hair washing/braiding, massages and smoothies.

name: Nocino's
description: Nocino's is the Tokyo Sector's Local Pizza Tavern in the 9 O'Clock neighborhood. That cozy social place where people come to hang after a long day of [redacted] and [censored] to connect with beer, pizza, and good music.

name: Node
description: Node is an oasis of epic proportions. serving coffee daily from 830ish-11, followed by morning vibes daily. Dont miss our Hip Hop BBQ on Wednesday!

name: No Drama Camp
description: We are all inclusive Camp that provides the Citizens of Black Rock City with a fun and interesting place to stop by for a Drink at our No Drama Bar.  We host many daily events under our large shade structure. Nightly DJ's play music for those stopping by on their way around the Playa.  Enjoy our fun oversized Bar Games, while you sip some of the best drinks to be found.  There is always something happening that you don't want to miss at No Drama Camp and Bar.

name: No Holes Barred Comedy Club
description: Oh my god we're back again! Brighten your day with Laugh Yoga, learn how to make friends and strangers laugh in our Stand Up Comedy Workshop, then test your new skills or win a prize during Open Mic Bingo. And the main event every night, our Stand Up Comedy Special! All Holes Welcome!

name: noMADart
description: Come create some Playa Art with us, learn ASL, tell camp fire stories or just enjoy ours. Family friendly activities everyday or just come and enjoy a cup of Joe and ponder the days adventure. Find us near Point 3 for some Sunrise Pancakes to celebrate our 6 Year Burner Wedding Anniversary!

name: Nom De Plume
description: We are a tea lounge that has yerba mate brewing the entire event. Come by to lurk, chill, and lounge. Relax while thriving, and drinking tea. The way life should be. We have a variety of other teas available throughout the week but always have yerba brewing. Sit down and hydrate while you start or finish your day. Yerba Mate Dub starts every day at 10:30am. Classic dub sounds from around the world as time turns elastic.

name: NonameNoname
location: Kelter & 8:05, Mountain side: Look for the basic b and the flag
description: Evan and Mark

name: Nonsense
description: Nonsense is where your imagination manifests a reality. Come experience what has been in your mind all along. We'll portal you to, through, in, and out what has been right in front of you. Unbuckle your mind for safety.

name: Nordic Paradise
description: Step into Nordic Paradise: where cold-brew coffee meets an exciting bar and rooftop cafe. Explore workshops for body and mind, dance to music, and chill out in style. Join our Qurious Viking party, celebrating all gender expressions. It's an unforgettable experience waiting for you. Welcome to Nordic Paradise!

name: Northern Lights
description: Sauna camp from Norway with a lounge litt in the northern lights.

name: Northwest Mist
description: World famous misting tent that is like walking into a rain forest on playa. Where we come together to provide a cool oasis for dusty travelers.

name: Nose Fish
description: Come get coffee from the Nose Fish itself (or this year maybe something even curiouser!) Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday mornings and stay for the music! Also, back by popular demand, we're giving away panties! Bike repair clinics are happening Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday afternoons, as well as personal lighting repair/tutoring, and darning your dazzling duds with our resident seamster/seamstress at our super sewing service!

name: No Sleep Hotel
description: The No Sleep Hotel is proud to open its doors to serve the waking dreams of the citizens of Black Rock City. Join us in the evening for shenanigans, whimsy, and the slowest service you'll find on any side of the playa. When the doors to your mind are open, our doors are open as well.

name: NOT a CAMP
description: This is NOT a CAMP. If you dig the art piece titled "1986", come to talk to us. We also like presents. And people who are present. We might even have presents.

name: NOT BORING
description: Step into our camp for exhilarating late-morning beats and an electrifying dance floor, where every inch is alive with the energy of those who live to move to the not boring rhythm.

name: Nothing Butt Art
description: We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks or any other body part. Together, we will create nothing butt art! Complimentary T-shirts provided to participants. No Body Shaming here; bring what you got, and we'll turn it into Art! Woohoo! We also feature body stamp temporary tattoos. Stop by, make some art and get a tramp stamp. Sunset Journey Home Table. Share your journey "Home" while enjoying an ice-cold IPA. Our bar table has become a focal point for all to express themselves with marking pens, paint, and pictures for gifting their stories for all who visit the camp.

name: Nowhere in Particular
description: Welcome to Nowhere in Particular! You've been working and partying hard all week, so let us lighten your load. Settle down and chill with us for a while. Read some poetry. Write some poetry. Have deep meaningful conversations while cooling off from the heat of the day.

name: Nuclear Dandelion
description: Unlock Your Inner Radiance at Nuclear Dandelion! Come visit our "One Dandy of a Spa" daily for hydrating facial masks.

name: NumbSkulls
description: Home of NumbSkull

name: NuTz Camp
description: Here comes the sun. Beautiful beats and positive vibrations overflow the Playa at NuTz Sunrise Parties. C'mon!

name: NYC Community Container
description: We Guarantee Nothing! But you'll probably pick up your gear from us if you're from NYC/NJ

name: NYC Deli
description: Please come to NYC Deli for authentic New York deli food and sassy service! We're serving bacon/egg/cheese sandwiches, bagels, coffee and tea 10:30am-12:30pm Friday through Sunday. Veggie, Vegan and GF options available! Service Note: Rangers, Medical, DPW, Law Enforcement, Parents with children and Differently-abled with mobility problems can cut the food line and get fed first. For the rest: Our food line is usually only 15m long and in that time we will teach you how to be a New Yorker. Lovingly, with some Seinfeld commentary! NYC Deli also hosts public swamp-cooled tents open during daylight hours. These spaces are quiet and un-programmed; perfect for napping during a hot afternoon!

name: Nyurmok
description: We are an art support camp for the playa installation "Nyurmok 2024".  We bring the gift of art, through visual and microtonal music expression.  Watch out for our frontage art pieces.

name: Ocean Beach
description: Drop anchor at one of the playa's exquisite beachfront properties and nurture body and soul with our beach yoga, workshops, and games. Or stop by for a drink at our beach bar, serving smoothies in the morning and beach cocktails in the afternoon (M-S, 9a-6p). Our beach area includes 2 kiddie rides for the young of age and mind. Sing along with Jimmy Buffett on Tuesday and devour a delicious cheeseburger in paradise. Come try our signature lobster pizza during our Wednesday late afternoon Pizza Palooza. Party with us on Friday because ... TGIF. We are a group of beach lovers operating a 100% green camp. If this all sounds like you, let us know. We accept newbies and are willing to help them adjust to the playa.

name: Oceyolotl Sanctuary
description: Jaguar Temple welcomes burners for evening healing ceremonies, transformational and fun game 'Animalia', traditional Mexican live music, out of this world singing and legends telling. Enjoy our special cacao, rituals and magical atmosphere!

name: Octopus Garden
description: Octopus Garden is a psychedelic underwater lounge and game room with evening through sunrise music and vibrant, funky vibes.

name: Off Brand
description: Bike not doing so hot? Come to our 24/7 bike repair area, we supply the tools and tarps. When we're open (2-5 Monday-Friday) we will have a team to help with your repair. While waiting for your bike, we offer stencil airbrushing and leather branding with a little mood music. Come visit we have shade and will share.

name: Off the Dome
description: Come explore & express yourself at Off the Dome.  Formerly known as Freestyle Palace, Off the Dome is back in the playa Wonderland for its second decade as the original musical imagination sanctuary: the Playa Talent Incubator. Our namesake, DIY Jam Dome is powered by the talent and creativity Black Rock City's citizens. Our stage, mics & instruments are available singing, rapping and making impromptu music.  Off the Dome hosts the hip hop visionaries:  Black City All-Stars and Black Rock City Regional Air Guitar Championships - now in its 10th year. We are all about the magical love of music! Come play & perform with other performers and creators at our innovative haven. At Off the Dome, do it live at Home in BRC.

name: Ofosho
description: Good ramen, a great playa moment! Serving the ramen experience on the playa the last 12 years. Doodle or dance to deep house or minimal techno while you wait, noodlessly polaroid yourself or connect with 100s of fellow burners either noodling around or slurping an irresistible bowl of happiness (we have got you covered vegetarians!). Ofosho memorable!

name: OHM HOME
description: OHM Home: We are a mutant vehicle support camp. Home of Ohm Kar, Manta and Vibe Apple. Come n boogie. Take the ride.

name: Oh mi Gato! Cat Cafe
description: Oh Mi Gato Cat Cafe, offering a unique cat experience for cat lovers, haters, and cat spirits. Come sip, snack, relax, and dance salsa with us. Clean your claws at our 24/7 spa and visit our cat art gallery space.

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment by our panel of experts. Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.

name: OKNOTOK
description: OKNOTOK stands as a beacon for those yearning to taste the magic of the unknown. Here, beneath a sign that dances between OPEN and CLOSED at the whim of the cosmic OK-CAFE team—comprising the alchemist CHEF, the voyaging SERVER, and the guardian HOST—reality is gently stirred and poured anew. Seated with strangers you will taste flavors unique to your combination... and whatever the CHEF might create just for you.

name: Olympus
description: Olympus is the home of the gods! We are a Bay Area based Burning Man camp dedicated to self-expression, inclusivity, and the celebration of every individual. Since 2016, Olympus has always strived to help people discover the best versions of themselves, their inner god. There is no limitation in terms of mythology; gods from all cultures, times, and places are welcome. Olympians also create own mythologies if the spirit takes them. The only limit is one's imagination. The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit.

name: Om Skillet
description: Om Skillet - serving the playa Gourmet Grilled Cheese  lunches Monday through Thursday and hosting the Short Stack TuTu Tuesday dance party at 2:22pm on Tuesday since 2011.

name: Once Upon A Teatime
description: Once Upon a Teatime will transport you to a world of wonder and enchantment as you step inside our fairytale lounge. We will be serving cold plant based matcha lattes to cool you off and energize your playa adventures.

name: Only mEmbers
description: "Only Members" bar (21and over). Only VIPs with proof of membership are permitted. Absolutely no exceptions. No butt thing..

name: Opulent Temple
description: Opulent Temple - Sacred dance to world class music since 2003.

name: Oracle Camp
description: Oracle Camp provides I-Ching and Kuan Yin readings everyday, all day and Tarot Card readings throughout the week depending on scheduling.

name: Oral Fixation
description: Come one, come all, to fixate on our tantalizing treats. Suckle your way to the pearly gates of bliss. We're also sharing secrets of relational connection and repair and we can also fix your bike if you're in a jam!

name: ORDINARY, NO EXTRA
location: Intrigue & 4:05, Man side: LOOK FOR THE ORANGE AND WHITE CHECKED FLAG.
description: CHILL CAMP TO RECHARGE, GET SHADE AND EAT BURGERS.

name: Organic Fruit & Veggie Camp
description: Daily Fruit & Veggie Bar offering fresh organic produce in a relaxed lounge space. Daily workshops and special offering to wet your palette and tickle your fancy.

name: Orgy Bus Camp
description: Orgy Bus Camp provides a safe and clean space for poly play parties on the playa. All of our parties have an opening ceremony where we practice consent and boundaries, as well as a fun opportunity to meet other guests. Our parties are at 3 PM and 11 PM daily.

name: Orphan Asylum
description: Orphan Asylum is a hodgepodge crew of misfits who come together through careful planning, organization and a dash of straight anarchy to create a unique social experiment that has not been terrible yet so far. We rely on the kindness of strangers, and making them not so strange (or stranger, depending) by the end of the burn, as well as providing sanctuary to strangers on playa in need of a desert home. We don't charge dues and are instead entirely donation-based from our past and current orphans. Folks donate everything from money to org support to moral support to technical/skill support. Before the burn, we take in new camp members on an application-basis.

name: Ouroboros
description: Ouroboros is the base of operations and mooring of or 50 person Crew for the SQ. The Study has a 1500sf Hexagonal main communal reception tent that is open to the public and is Replete with small stage and ample seating for discourse in a Salon like setting following Traditional Oratorial Procedure.

name: Owl and the Pussycat
description: We are a small but mighty group of folx whose camp is a safe, welcoming environment for all Burners. We not only value physical comfort as seen by our cozy lounge and dining space, but emotional comfort to promote connection, conversation and reflection with our fellow Burners. We also value a good time! Come by our quiet Dream Hatchery lounge where you can take pause and meditate or join us for a tea leaf reading to ruminate on your dreams. The Owl and the Pussycat is like a warm hug for your Burn.

name: P³ Oasis
description: P³ Oasis is a bar. We serve hard liquor, all day every day, unless nobody feels like working at the moment. But if one of us is awake, one of us is behind the bar, so there you go.

name: Pablo's Breakfast Cantina & Spa
description: Pablo's Breakfast Cantina and Spa Start your day with breakfast quesadillas, churro pancakes, micheladas, margaritas, spa treatments, and dancing!

name: Pablos Crusty Creatives
description: Inclusive art support camp. Always looking for wayward, collaborative arts

name: PALINKA LOUNGE
description: Palinka Lounge offers a welcoming respite for Burners new and old around the globe, we offer a comfortable environment for Burners to take a moment to relax, have a drink, introduce themselves, and learn about what it means to be a burner (or learn about Hungarian burners) gaining from our camp-members Burning Man knowledge. We do this not only through sharing a drink, but also by engaging in activities together such as arts/craft, games or trampoline.

name: Pam's Parlor
description: Welcome one and all to Pam's Parlor, where you can find shade and get shiny with our custom flash tattoos designed specifically for the Burn, or enjoy other scheduled events such as gourmet hot dogs (and veggie dogs), Tarot reading, meditation, and more! Please feel free to climb up onto the back of our art car to get a great view of the neighborhood at any time of day or night--we look forward to seeing you there!

name: Pancake Playhouse
description: Start your day off with some feel-good jams paired with hot-off-the-griddle pancakes, Monday, Wednesday, Friday 10ish-12ish. And swing by Tuesday and Thursday 3ish-5ish for some disco beats and drinks.

name: pandemonium
description: Kinky or jus curious ?  either way we have  a home for you at camp pandemonium Where chaos becomes joy, and pain is pleasure. Home of the Flaming Heart.  come enjoy some of our guided kink classes in rope, flogging /impact, and fireplay. enjoy our 2 story pyramid and grand views above the dust . swing is our lyra open 24/7.  dance w djs on our intimate  dance floor. meet old friends and make new ones. pandemonium is what you make it ...come explore

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
description: Our camp keeps our fellow Burners biking: our repair shop offers education, tools and parts, for bike repair. Actually we'll help you repair just about anything, but bikes are our specialty. We also love to mix drinks and host visitors in our adjacent lounge. Bike repair is our specialty, we will teach you to do your repair. We are open 24 hrs a day. We have a bar and lounge to make life easier.

name: Paper Cranes
description: Come find refuge from the elements of the Playa. Have an ice-cold michelada or a homemade pickleback at our bar, "The Fold". Or enjoy a hot tea while you listen to some funky beats. Share a wish and write it in an origami crane, and we'll deliver it safely to the temple before the Sunday burn.

name: Paradise Motel
description: Step into a slice of '60s roadside kitsch reimagined for the playa at Paradise Motel, nestled in the heart of the gayborhood. By day, indulge in the best snow cones around—show your junk, cut to the front—and dance to themed beats from Madonna Monday to Diva Thursday. Nighttime unveils a giant Lite Brite, spontaneous speakeasy adventures, and cozy fireside gatherings. We're a flamboyance of queer and ally burners from the Bay Area (and beyond), creating a space where every flamingo can spread their wings and flamingle in true Burning Man style. Interested in joining our flamboyance? Contact us!

name: Parched Albatross Hookah & Bar
description: Parched Albatross Hookah Lounge and Bar

name: Pariah Express Camp
description: Home of the Pariah Express Mutant Vehicle , a large double decked people mover open to any and all.  we start and end our day here

name: Parley
description: Parley is your dedicated conversation camp.  Come "Parley" with us during our daily facilitated events and our drop in 24/7 for adhoc conversations on topics of your choice (deep, fun or controversial). Our mission is to facilitate meaningful conversations and bridge gaps between people who may disagree with each other.  Participants that accept the Parley (and agree to its' rules) shall be under our protection. No one shall be left feeling unwelcome and no one will be silenced or shunned for simply expressing an idea.  The topics and framing are done in a way that everyone can have an opinion and a voice. In our conversation pit, under the flag of truce, ideas and thoughts shall be shared, rapport shall be built and new friends made.

name: Parliament Art Crew
description: We're the Support Art Camp that has brought in the past these art installations for the delight of our community. ATABEY's Treasure, MÚCARO and Got Framed.

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: We serve cold alcohol Tiki Punch, for those age 21 and over (ID is required), starting at 11:00am daily. We serve all day and into the night. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Stop in and have a seat in shade or where you can get some sun. You are bound to meet someone new and the environment here encourages having conversations. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get "leid";. Come party with us for our 14th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly. Remember nude is not lewd.

name: Patsy's Hangout
description: Patsy's Hangout is a fabulous lounge in the gayborhood where you can connect with old friends and make new ones while enjoying a refreshing cocktail. Enjoy high-energy tunes, good company and a comfortable space all day, every day. Stop by for our daily recurring activities including: Patsy's lounge, which is always open, Patsy's Classical Morning Brew: Serving coffee with classical chill music every morning 9 AM to 12 Noon and Patsy's Bar: Serving cold beverages, and lots of ice, every day 12 Noon to 7 PM. Participate in our daily special events including our dueling pianos happy hour on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday, Patsy's Closet on Monday, Patsy's Nail Salon on Tuesday, and our Cubs, Otters, and Bears, Oh My! on Thursday. And don't forget to explore Patsy's Parlor while you're here.

name: Penguin Place
description: Penguin Place, a welcoming home for dusty travelers from up-and-down the West Coast. Daily chai, trampoline, mid-week ice-throne event and a lounge to keep cool and meet and mix with fellow burners at several eclectic parties throughout the week.

name: Penis Envy
description: Na

name: Penny Smashing Point
description: Our custom pressed penny machine turns ordinary pennies into unique BM souvenirs.

name: People of Color Camp
description: Bringing COLOR to the playa since 2014! The People of Color Camp is what happens when The Muppet Show gets put in the same telepod as an episode of The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, MTV's The Real World and a debate at the United Nations. We provide opportunity for BIPOC Burners to not only learn about and experience Burning Man, but make it our home. We bring the diversity of our cultures to the playa through events, workshops and simply our presence. We bring our music, our soul, our rhythm, our culture… Unapologetically! We welcome all people of all backgrounds. Stop by! Add some color to your burn! It's always love! :)

name: People's Art Congress
description: We are a collection of various artists working in diverse mediums, seeking a range of expression and serendipity. We have interactive art, DIY art, intuitive readings, cuddle spaces, a labyrinth, brain talks, philosophy slams, and welcoming space for various spontaneous activities all day and night.

name: Pepperland
description: Pepperland is your Playa home for the newbie and the veteran. We are a mellow camp with a Beatles vibe that will send you on a Magical Mystery Tour. We have a lot of workshops we do in camp, so many to choose from! You can also just stop by and relax in the Octopus's Garden and chill out!

name: Perihelion
description: Welcome a brilliant morning at our Planet Brunch parties (Mon-Fri, 11-1)! Discover an unexpected oasis under the scorching noonday sun: chilled cucumber sandwiches, loaded drunken pancakes, frozen Pina Coladas, and spiked Frappuccinos! Come for the hotcakes, stay for the live-music dance jams and giant adult coloring boards.

name: Perky Parts
description: A random group of people who share the same motto: "We can't pace ourselves" and believe the only way of knowing is to go and find out!

name: Phasmantis
description: Phasmantis brings snow cones, pop tarts, and dank beats to the playa. Stop by on a hot day and grab a drink and some saucy snow cones to cool off.  Or climb up on our roof deck for views of the playa.

name: PickleBack Mountain
description: Come by and enjoy our homemade Pickle Back Juice at our Pickle Back Bar. Come through our Saloon Doors in Space, mosey on up to bar, throw down a Pickle Back! Then, for the daring, jump on Gherkin our famous Bucking Pickle for the buck of your life!

name: Pickleback Oasis
description: Take a break from the hot sun and stop in for a cold Pickleback. Relax and meet new friends under our shade structure.

name: Pickle Joint
description: Downtown Black Rock City's favorite magical little hole in the wall. Serving our world famous Pickle-Tini Cocktail since… errp… too long. Let's say well over a decade. Always a sumptuous groove on our dance floor….or maybe a Led Zeppelin Kazoo orchestra.

name: Pier Pressure
description: We are the support camp for the Mutant Vehicle, Pier Pressure!  Look for our floating pier cruising the playa all week long.

name: Pigmalions
description: Pigmalions offers Bloody Marys and bacon from 11ish until we run out. Join us in our Pig Pen to enjoy the vibes as we offer you the best in service at our award winning bar! Play with the pigs while you wait for your treats. Our 13 ingredient Bloody Mary recipe is sure to please! (Only 12 ingredients if you want a virgin.)

name: Pinhole Project
description: Come create large format pinhole photography to capture art installations and the community in the desert! We have built a darkroom every burn since 1999. We host art-making workshops every morning. We take the workshop on an art tour using old-school pinhole cameras loaded with photographic paper. This allows participants to slow down, observe their surroundings more closely, and truly immerse themselves in the process of capturing images. Plus, the unique aesthetic of pinhole photography adds a distinctive charm to the photographs, making them truly special mementos of the experience.

name: Pink Heart
description: We welcome all Burners! Whatever state you are in, you are welcome at Pink Heart. Recalibrate your body, mind and spirit with chilled water, vegan ice cream served on Tues and Wed from 1pm-4pm, and transformative buffer massages. Process how Black Rock City has blown your mind and changed you into something different. Find your way home via our Pink Heart Arch Beacon or stop and feel safe in our comfy pink cocoon of shade. Share your experiences (and yourself) on our pink fur couches while gazing upon the beautiful open Playa.

name: Pink Lightning
description: Pink Lightning is the home of the Burning Man Ultramarathon, and all things running at Burning Man: the 5k, the beer mile, the naked mile, easy mile, and more! Come to run an event or support an event. We also love all things PINK!

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a 501c3 Non-Profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We create an inclusive environment of love, compassion, connection, and self expression both on and off the playa.

name: Pink Ponies
description: Pink Ponies is a diverse collection of kind and welcoming queer campers. We create parties and workshops that help build ties through shared interests and giving without expectations! We pride ourselves on being a great place for all campers to meet and mingle the first Sunday night at our Queeer Homecoming. We also offer daily workshops on a variety of topics close to our community's heart. We celebrate randomness, and anything goes at this weirdly joyful camp. Come build relationships with us that will last a lifetime.

name: Pinky Swears
description: We are the art support camp for Looking Up Arts. We design and fabricate art in San Francisco, CA. Our camp is open to teaching and mentoring art fabrication skills, and we accept new members with sponsorship through late July, depending on space.

name: Plaisance
description: Plaisance: a joyful pleasantness which captures the spirit of frenchness and fake-frenchness. Our French toast and Iced glace are examples of our events. Come by early for French Press coffee, or relax on our shaded veranda with lemonade and iced tea.

name: Planetary Playground
description: Visit our giant Jupiter and bounce on our moons!

name: Planet Bound
description: Take a look at what you are, versus who believe you are or will be, off planet... Participating as explorers our campers navigate life's experiences through altered states of transformation. Come by for our scheduled events or spontaneous demonstrations as we wax the philosophical. We have shade and an art car. We (almost) lock burners in our box of animal crackers and strongly encourage them to share cultural conversations! We listen for possibility. It's millennial torture.

name: planet wood collective
description: Campers: designers, architects, and engineers in the built Environment. Focus on the development of low-carbon infrastructure and living in Black Rock City. Give back to the community by sharing knowledge from yearly experimentation and iterations.

name: Planned Playahood
description: We offer "second aid" services including contraceptives, pregnancy tests, and hygiene products and a Menstruation Station to help you stock up on your needs. Pay homage to Our Lady of the Shaven Beaver, where you can experience your playa rebirth. Visit our bar The Rusty Speculum for your daily speculum shot and themed cocktails, stop by our photo booth, climb our tower or use the couch swing, get a faux-scription from our camp 'doctors' for whatever ails you, or mix up your playa wardrobe at our costume exchange. Visit The Musuem of Dildonts (items you don't want to put in your body), or stop by for daily events, parties, DJs, a shaded dance floor that just won't quit. We have it all to Un-Fuck your Burn!

name: Playa Agora
description: Our camp is a wonderland of interactivity, offering a smorgasbord of workshops that'll ignite your curiosity and fuel your soul. Join us as we craft an unforgettable experience at Burning Man 2024, where learning and laughter intertwine in a spectacular dance of community and creativity!

name: Playa Alterations
description: Playa Alterations is your one-stop shop for chopping, cropping, bedazzling, sprucing, or painting up your favorite duds! We have sewing supplies, apertif cocktails, cold brew coffee, and tunes to carry you through your week.

name: Playa Art Park Support
description: A camp to support the Playa Art Park, a place to enjoy smaller art in a cozy setting.

name: Playa Bears
description: Come chill and get your bearings at Playa Bears! Where we're always bruin' up good times and kodiak moments. Our forebears believed in dancing, strong drinks, delicious food, and koality time with friends. We're serving up all of the above in our Playa Bear Den! Do you need a place to get away from the pandemonium of the playa? Fur the love of the man, honey! Come join us at one of our events or stop by anytime for a cocktail and a bear hug.

name: Playa Choir
description: Playa Choir is a performance art piece open to all participants.  Come and join us for a rowdy,  spirit-lifting musical experience!  Radical Inclusion, no audition required!  Singers of all skill levels, ages and persuasions are welcome! Also seeking musicians, dancers and aerialists. Rehearsals are Tuesday through Saturday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 pm.  Join us on the risers or just come to listen.  Full  performances are on Sunday: Sunrise at the Temple and 11:00am in the Playa Choir Dome.  An additional collaboration performance with the Black Rock Philharmonic tbd.   Performances are a non-denominational, non-religious, spiritual, moving experience. More information and music can be obtained in advance at our website or contact musical director Madi.

name: Playa Circuit Boogie
description: Here at Playa Circuit Boogie we use circuits and science to spark ideas and bring strangers together, all while jamming out to groovy tunes and enjoying a cold beverage from our bar. Come learn the basics of soldering and circuit building; ride away with your very own light-up pendant and the skills to make an even better one next year. And bring us your broken electronics during repair hours, we'll try our best to get them working.

name: PlayaDough
description: Are you a burner hungry in body and in spirit? PlayaDough will treat you to delicious dumplings, vodka and unsafe doses of eastern european nihilism.

name: Playa Express
description: The support camp of Playa Express Mutant vehicule Come for daily  fresh Expresso Martinis, and get a to get ride on the MV around sunset time

name: Playa Glass
description: Would you like to make jewelry from the playa dust? Grab a pair of welding goggles and harness the energy of the sun to melt the playa into glass. We provide the instructions, tools, and supplies, you cast your artistic aspirations into glass.

name: PlayAground
description: We are playground with radical swings ,a shaded lounge and bar with couches and games.

name: Playa Info/VRT
description: NEW LOCATION, look for the Blue "I" in the sky Providing Oracles, Digital Services, Lost and Found, ASL, Health Permits and BRC Lockout and Towing Services. Open 9am-6pm daily with limited services 8am-11am on Sept. 3

name: Playa Jack Rabbits Dusty Hole Bar
description: Playa Jackrabbits Dusty Hole Saloon is here to wet your whistle while roaming the BRC backstreets.  Stop by say and spin the wheel of truth or dare.

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: A celebration of Jazz Music featuring nightly concerts and jam sessions, daytime educational workshops, and a lively bar serving coffee and cocktails.

name: Playa Morada
location: Gobsmack & 7:05, Mountain side: Actually, we're at 7:07, but you'll find us!
description: A happy crew of Sonoma and Colorado Burners

name: Playa Name Pawn Shop
description: Welcome to the Playa Name Pawnshop, the one-stop-shop for anyone looking to explore the power of names and how they connect to identity. Expert name-givers are here to guide you through the process and help you find a name that truly reflects your inner playa spirit! Don't have a playa name and want one? Come on down! Are you tired of your playa name? Do you want to embrace a new identity that is full of double entendre and mischief? Look no further!

name: Playa Party Patrol
description: We are a global community who travel and party together around the world. At Burning Man we operate the Pardywagon art car and assemble as the party patrol and spread love and fun together. We support small to mid named DJs and artists who deserve a highly visible platform to perform on. We are San Francisco and NYC based.

name: Playa Paul's Concierge Service
description: Discover Playa Paul's Concierge Service, where unparalleled support meets the spirit of Burning Man. Our camp redefines the playa experience with a suite of services, including daily gourmet coffee service, refreshing afternoon beverages, and personalized RV maintenance. Embrace the convenience of our on-site concierge including pump outs, water, and art tour bookings. Each evening, join our vibrant community gatherings for networking and relaxation. Our interactive art installations and dedicated spaces foster creativity and connection. At Playa Paul's, we ensure your journey is as fulfilling and comfortable as the memories you'll create. At Playa Pauls you are a VIPP!

name: Playa Penthouse
description: Elevated, restful, shady platform, from which to view the entire Playa. Lively discussions about life and relationships. Coffee in the mornings, cocktails in the evenings. Dance parties day and night. Our interior chill space/playpen is perfect midday or midnight. People from all over the world come to share experiences or simply enjoy our view in silence. "Our view doesn't suck"! We are the home of the Eros Tangier. Informal discussions all week on topics as varied and vital as "Living The 10 Principles", "Couples Communication", "Self-acceptance in sexual transition", "Finding a safe space for partners to express and discuss fantasies" and "We Love You! Do not fear".

name: Playa Pete's Plaza
description: We built a ship that doesn't float to sail on a lake that isn't there.

name: Playa Piano Bar and Lounge
description: Playa Piano Bar and Lounge will be featuring live collaborative musical performance along with refreshing beverages every afternoon except Friday. Come by Tuesday for Tutus and Tacos from 12 -2 Come by Friday for Pizza Pockets and Pickles from 12 -2 Drinks and music every afternoon Monday to Thursday 2 to 5 or 6

name: Playasophy
description: Playasophy is a Burning Man camp based primarily out of Seattle and San Francisco. We've been on playa since 2010, and you can usually find us serving iced coffee in the hot afternoons. We offer an open, welcoming shaded spot to pass the day and a relaxing lounge in the evenings with music and alcohol that challenges your tastebuds.

name: ¡Playasos!
description: Come ride Señor Snail von Slidesmouth, a 40' foot long giant tube slide dressed up like a monstrous rainbow snail! Sure to make you squeal like a kid again, this ride is open at all times for all peoples, large and small alike. von Slidesmouth is eager and ready to take you on a ride and swallow you down into his dark and thrilling underbelly. This ain't your school playground's slide. Just don't be embarrassed when the 5 year old in front of you is less scared than you are :)

name: Playfully Yours Village
description: Playfully Yours VIllage is an adult themed camp. The Playfully Yours Dungeon is a well equipped dungeon area for those who are beginners and intermediate and also those who have been curious about dungeon play. We provide a welcoming experience in a safe and supervised dungeon. We have a variety of equipment and toys for you to experiment and play with such as floggers, crops and paddles and we will show you how to use them properly and help facilitate your play.  We focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon play. Spend some time in our Playfully Yours Lounge and enjoy a tasty beverage. Spin our wheel of play, we dare you! Enjoy being the pet in our human petting zoo. Enjoy a spanking or flogging while you visit! Enjoy our great music, stop by to dance, and drink with us!

name: Playground
description: Playground is an oasis for the intrepid burner crossing the vast expanse of BRC. Filled with sights, sounds and music, Playground will entrance and delight with fun, fire and dance!

name: Pleasant Camp
description: A pleasant place to be.

name: PlovKraft
description: We cook delicioud PLOV and serve it daily!

name: Plurraffinity
description: Get ready to dive into the ultimate rave and furry fusion at PLURAffinity Camp! Join us for engaging kandi making workshops, climbable interactive art installations, and a full on Rave!  Come unleash your inner beast and rave with us at PLURAffinity Camp!

name: Ply Curious
description: A fun loving semi eccentric group inviting all to experience the unknown. Be loving. Be musical. Be creative. And above all.....be curious!

name: PO@6
description: We are the center camp post office. We send your postcards and love every year all around the world. You know us! You love us! Now bring us your stamps!

name: PO9
description: We connect you with the world, we are the original way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for decades.  We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark!  (US postage encouraged/required), and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon. On-playa updates: http://twitter.com/brcpo9

name: Poetry in Motion
description: Poetry in Motion is a small family camp of artists and makers. We would love for you to come by and participate in making word art, Poetry. Open all day every day.

name: Polaris
description: An international, illuminating, and intergalactic camp, Polaris serves as a shining symbol of radical way finding. Steadfast in our statement to love and care for one another, our coordinates in the constellation of Black Rock City offers a signal to those searching within the starlight.

name: Pollination Station
description: Pollination Station is a classroom camp with one goal: providing detailed information regarding the proper care, proliferation, and value of native pollinators including bees, butterflies, moths, birds, and bats...aided by the liberal application of honey-flavoured booze and sweet confectioneries. Join us and support the 10 Principles through education and skill development!

name: PolyParadise
description: PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from '2:00 - 10:00' since 1999 celebrating 26 years in BRC in 2024. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. We welcome ALL Poly & Poly Friendly folks to camp within our borders. PolyParadise 2024 welcomes the Twisted Swan | Temple of Bacchus as part of your Playa Experience. PolyParadise is NOT a Swinger Camp. Being Poly or Practicing Poly is NOT a requirement for camping with us, but being OPEN MINDED about other people's lifestyle choices IS!!

name: Pookah Lounge/SNAFUBAR
description: Pookah Lounge— an old-school burners' paradise, complete with fine company, xmas lights, art & music, thrills, and chills... But what makes it really cool is YOU. Drop by and be cool. SNAFUBAR—the better beverage bar—drop by and stay in school! We'll mix you the best drink on the Playa!

name: PopoVille
description: PopoVille is your local watering hole with an artisitc twist please come enjoy our excellent "M" cocktails and enjoy chilling out in our grafitti zone

name: Poppy Moon Saloon
description: Step right up to The Poppy Moon Saloon, a vibrant and welcoming haven for those looking to kick back or karaoke it up, enjoy some dance'n and sip on a drink or two. You can dive into some delightful crafting or wonder over to the Nautilus (A Curiouser and curiouser Rabbit hole) art installation, enveloped in a large, spiraling silk fabric. This captivating structure invites participants to journey through its gracefully curving passageways.

name: Portal to the New Earth
description: Art support camp for the 1:44 Tri-Sky Portal. We host New Earth Visioning meetings everyday at noon from Tuesday to Saturday

name: Porta Party
description: Porta Party: The camp with the remote controlled Porta Potty and Hel's Diner art car from which they serve potstickers!

name: Possible Muertos
description: Wake up from the dead with Possible Muertos! Join us for morning movement classes (yoga, stretch, calisthenics), afternoon drinks with themes from around the world. And night-lighted games for nightcrawlers. Our camp features a shaded lounge with bar as well as a double-decker dome available to kick back, relax and take in the playa views. Other camp features include lawn games, art walls, instant photos and a misting/hydration station open during public events. Stop by daily between 10am-6pm.

name: Post Nuclear Family
description: Post Nuclear Family is our shelter in the nuclear furnace of the man burn. We're born with our biological family and then we find our logical family in the friends we make. Each of us are different artists under a single roof sharing unique interactive experiences. * Our home is a space for you to explore the universe aboard Starship Qubit * Two Minute Photo Booth * Free Electroshock Therapy is available upon demand * Cusiouser & Curiouser Headspace

name: Potty Project
description: Home of the Potty Project a group of volunteers helping teach proper potty usage and make the potties fun! We offer volunteer shifts M-F of the event so stop in to sign-up!

name: Powder Palace
description: We are proud Northerners bringing a winter chill to the playa and looking forward to sharing some of our winter delights.  Come by for snowshoe races and our apres-ski dance party!

name: Practice Camp
description: Practicing since 2012.   Home of the WE ARE, EXQUISITE DORKS & UNIDENTIFIED art pieces.  Come by and interact with them and us!

name: Preservation Society
description: Preservation Society: Preserving what has been lost. Our luscious green garden is your oasis in the desert. Our events refresh you with music and dance. Our bar serves potent potables with preserves from all the corners of the world from which our camp hails.

name: Pretentious Fox
description: Our name may be Pretentious but we're a diverse, international crowd with an eclectic mix of personalities and playa offerings, including our Flying Fox swing-set, the Fox Hole Bar, Foxy Beats, and parties and self-improvement workshops galore. Come get Foxy with us.

name: Pretty Pickle
description: A relaxed and welcoming outpost on the dusty road to nowhere. We have daily afternoon pickle service (Noon to 3 pm). Cold pickles and pickletini shots! We invite passersby to step under our shade, enjoy a refreshing treat, and ride our disco pickle swing! In-the-know visitors may inquire about our playa-famous pickle warmers!

name: Priscilla
description: Priscilla, the Imperfect camp with an Aussie twist addressing radical self-expression and how to unleash your imperfect. We're still the camp that you know and love, with Dildo Olympics (with a Disco Twist) gracing our backs with its sticky presence, our usual tear-the-house-down inclusive parties including a Rizzle & Sizzle (with sausages and arguments about whether tomato sauce belongs in the fridge or in the cupboard) and new hosts of the Official Paris Olympics After Party featuring real life French people - wow! Come for a refreshing dose of 'Who Gives A F*ck' and stay for the bloody good company. xoxo - Priscilla & the gang

name: Prismaticamp
description: Various artists coming together to offer LED knowledge.

name: Project Awake
description: "Awake" emerges from the collective imagination of a group of inspired individuals, bound by creativity and a shared vision. Our mission? To awaken hearts to the power of love and elevate consciousness. It represents the bridge between our human existence and our transcendent realm, showing that love is the ultimate answer and urging a collective transcendence beyond ego. In a world craving for healing, "Awake" stands as a symbol of hope, offering a pathway towards enlightenment and unity. This installation is more than art; it's a catalyst for change. We invite everyone to let down the ego, open your heart and join this journey. Stand with us in spreading love and light. Together, we can forge a new path for our world, one filled with love, peace and collective well-being. We are AWAKE!

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the gift of Fire to humanity since the dawn of time, Prometheatrics has been a fixture of Black Rock City's Esplanade since 2002 and hosts a fine interactive collection ready to surprise and delight you! Step inside the Tesseract to experience yourself as you truly are: infinite! Trace your face at our Self Portrait Studio and take home a masterpiece or shoot a selfie in Clesthyra's Eye. Enjoy a bounce on our Danpoline, enter the dream-space of the Infinitipi or admire the playa's colors through the radiant FrameBows. Join us for dusk and dawn spin jams on our mirrored stage, where there's a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!

name: Pussy Avalanche
description: In spite of what degenerates might think on first read - Pussy Avalanche is all about cats.  Like cats, games, books, or dorky references?  Welcome home.

name: Pussy Day Spa
description: If there is one "must do" at Burning Man, it's a visit to the Pussy Day Spa. We offer a choice of refreshing body wash, pubic hair trim, and pussy massage including happy ending. What's not to like? Pleasure and bliss awaits as we pamper and delight you. Your boundaries will be respected, your feedback / adjustments encouraged, and your wishes fulfilled. We guarantee it will be the best experience you will ever have at Burning Man, or anywhere else. Open daily from 1 to 5 pm, we take reservations (recommended) as well as walk-ins.

name: Putt Putt Palace
description: Putt Putt Palace hosts a, 24/7, glow in the dark miniature golf corse and holds daily tournaments. Come stop by for our early am coffee bar and our open every afternoon Putt Putt Bar where we serve both spirits and non-alcoholic beverages.

name: Pyramid Portal
description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of the pyramids as we come together to craft a sanctuary for all. Join us for an enchanting journey filled with sound healing, enriching conversations, ecstatic dance, and captivating ritual theater performances. Your presence is called up to add magic of our temple.

name: qt pies
description: The qt pies are an eclectic collective of souls inviting you to explore quixotic transcendence. We're on a mission to understand the temporal nature of identity and imagine new versions of self, community, and world. Spend time with us and embrace your pie-in-the-sky ideas. Our doors are open to the most curious. Our camp is a cozy, intimate home base for all of our adventures. We curate a wide spectrum of experiences from serene and sensual to hypnotic and party-popping. With us, the boundaries between dream and reality dissolve. Come find the magic in boundless possibility.

name: Quarks and Recreation
description: Games for Progress! Play! Scientists vs. Jabberwocks! Discover! Nuclear Fusion Bocce-Golf! Learn! The modern wonders of the Atomic Age! Your local Quarks and Recreation department invites you to experience our comprehensive catalog of nuclear-inspired games, physics trivia, labyrinthian bureaucracy, and definitely-not-radioactive "drinks" at the elusive h-bar. (Void where the strong nuclear force is inhibited; the electromagnetic force may apply).

name: Queertirement
description: Queer Retirement Community - Hang with the queer playa elders, drink lemonade, bring magic, love, and gifts and receive great wisdom.

name: Questionable Camp
description: Welcome to Questionable Camp, where the lines blur between reality and imagination, and the only certainty ... is a questionable one.  If you're seeking a dose of whimsical play and art, join us for some questionable times!!!

name: Rabbit Hole
description: It's whatever you want it to be!

name: Radial Sonic Runway Art Support
description: Art support camp for the Radial Sonic Runway.

name: RADICALOHA
description: RADICALOHA is a camp of Aloha! We bring the Hawaiian Culture to Black Rock City. We offer hula, workshops, DJ music and authentic shave ice.

name: Radio Electra
description: Live coverage of Burning Man streaming 24-7 during the event. Real news, Fake news, mayhem, music and good times.

name: Raditude
description: A collective of Lucid & Light lucky individuals serving up Rad-Attitude Adjustments every DAWN & DUSK with a themed streetside Fireplace Art Piece and an Alchemy Tea Lounge; shoe-free shade and more for all those building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!

name: Ragnarokk
description: Ragnarok is the End and the Beginning. It tells a story where destruction is necessary for creation to flourish. It is rebirth, it is recovery, it is rejuvenation, it is a renaissance, it's renewal, restoration, and resurrection. It is what we are experiencing in our lives right now. It is Burning Man. And now, it's us. We are camp Ragnarokk!

name: Rainbow Geometric
description: Rainbow Geometric is the art support camp for Photon Wizard. in 2024 he will be bringing a giant shell Honoraria project. There will be a geometric archway in the front of camp.

name: Raised by Wolves
description: An actual wolf pack is primarily composed of siblings. We're not related—or wolves—but we do yell at the moon. Raised by Wolves is a community of artists and doers who gather in the desert to create epic fun and invite everyone in to share our space and run with the wolves. Come visit us (T, Th, + F) for nights filled with beautiful live music, whimsical interactions, and unique artistic and creative experiences. From magical elixirs to intimate puppet shows, amateur dentistry, and hand stuff, it's an evening to remember. We also serve the best evening beverages to keep you going all night long. On Tue, Wed, and Thurs during the day we offer the opportunity to battle friends and foes alike with foam swords. No experience needed. It's the best thing you'll put in your hand all day. We're fun.

name: Rancho Sparkle Pony
description: Find your stage at our venue, The Rubber Spur.  Contact us to hold an event, teach a workshop, learn how to run a theme camp, a world-class playa camp kitchen, learn how to operate an art car project!    Rancho Sparkle Pony is your home away from home at Playa BRC!

name: Ranger Headquarters
description: Black Rock Ranger Headquarters – The center of Black Rock Ranger Operations. Located on the Esplanade at 5:45.

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description: Ranger Outpost Berlin - The Black Rock Ranger Station in the 3:00 sector where participants in need of assistance can seek out the help of a friendly Black Rock Ranger. Located at 3:00 and C.

name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
description: Ranger Outpost Tokyo - the Black Rock Ranger station in the 9:00 sector where participants in need of assistance can seek out the help from the Black Rock Rangers. Located at the corner of 9:00 and C.

name: Rascal
description: A sassy camp full of rascals who want to provide you with beats, art, quesadillas, cheap drinks, and mischief.  Come hungry. Leave begging for more.

name: Rat Trap
description: We are your dirty bar that never closes. Come on by day or night. Drink our booze, ride our horses and join us in radical self stupidity.

name: Ray's Fix It
description: Break something? We'll try to fix it! No promises, other than you'll leave with something and we'll have a good time trying. Power tools and expertise available Office Hours, otherwise 24/7 DIY with hand tools, work space, and plenty of materials to MacGyver your issue. No bikes or mutant vehicle help, though we'll try to point you in the right direction.

name: Ready Playa One
description: Ready Playa One - a world that we dream up, believe in, and step curiously into, together in Black Rock City. Each day is an adventure to expand our minds, deepen human connection, and creatively challenge the status quo's of the world that we believe in changing.

name: Rears! Bar and Hill
description: Prepare yourself for an extraordinary adventure at the residence of Hippie Hill Mutant Vehicle and 'Rears!' themed bar. Come and join Norm and the rest of the crew to make unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime... or at least a few hours.

name: Recycle Camp
description: CRUSH IT w/the Recyclonauts at Recycle Camp. Bring us your mesh bag of empty aluminum cans (plz no tin/steel/glass/plastic) & ride the amazing bicycle powered Crushinator!

name: Redhanded
description: Do you have dust in curious places? Visit Redhanded to freshen up sustainably. We will pamper you with a drink and let you complain about the heat, especially if you are on your period. We have precious supplies that will help with your period and personal hygiene before and after playtime. We have funnels that will make your dream of peeing in a porto without opening the lid come true. Come to Redhanded if you're caught red-handed by your bodily functions! You can visit us at sunset for our scheduled activities or swing by at any other time to make our stage yours.

name: Red.it.be
description: Red.it.be is a techno camp at Burning Man that channels the Berlin club scene with the best techno music and a giant dark cube dance floor. During the day, it's a chill-out space, and at night, the party continues with high-quality techno music. The camp is open to everyone and encourages self-expression.

name: Red Nose District
description: Red Nose District (RND) has been in existence, in one form or another since 1998. In 2013, we resolved to keep our hearts, minds, and noses RED from now until the end of time! RND has roots and participants in LA, SF, Santa Fe, NYC, Las Vegas, Pacific NW, Canada, Israel, France, & various states & countries around the world. Our members are involved in (or are lovers of) the circus arts, & work to bring our skills & talents to the playa in forms that allow for immersive & participatory experiences for citizens of Black Rock City. Notable past projects/activities include: High Chair Stilt Bar, PedalBump, Muse, Fire Wire, Wheel of Fortune, Zenobia Blanca stilt limo, Mega Mega, Bounce Back, stilt lessons, 30' swings, & circus variety shows of all forms! Come find us on the playa!

name: Red Rooster Ranch
description: The Red Rooster Ranch art car celebrates the fun and frivolity of Nevada's tawdry past and present association with saloons and cat houses. Come join us for a ride and enjoy a libation in our tiny saloon!

name: Refugee Camp
description: The journey to Burning Man involves leaving behind the familiar and embarking on a journey towards the unknown. This shared experience resonates deeply with the journey of immigrants, refugees, and boat people, who leave behind everything they know to navigate unfamiliar territory in search of a sense of home in an unlikely place. Black Rock City Refugee Camp celebrates the strength, resilience, ingenuity, and compassion of these remarkable communities. With open hearts, we welcome all who seek solace, camaraderie, and belonging. Join our journey of resilience and celebration, as we create a space where the enduring spirit of immigrants, refugees, and boat people shines brightly in the heart of Black Rock City.

name: ReImaginate
description: We are bringing night market where we will join forces together with our fellow camps within Alight market to present a diverse array of offerings from our varied cultural backgrounds.

name: Religious As Fuck
description: Camp Religious As Fuck provides decomodified and non-judgy Christian spiritual practice and hospitality.

name: Reno Housewives
description: Costuming BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

name: Retire-Bees
description: Our camp will be offering a rooftop deck atop the Bombus Regius Steampunk Airship Art Car ( docked for the summer ) stationed Esplanade within The Hive Village. Our upper deck event space will host a variety of events such as Karaoke, Dark and Stormy Story telling events, Tabletop and RPG daytime. The lower deck features a Tiki Bar plus some Fancy Festive and Fun pedal powered Rickshaws that will ferry guests from camp to the playa for adventures and Tiki Light Totems.

name: Retrofrolic
description: Retrofrolic is an adult destination offering a 2100 sq ft playspace and 1800 sq ft of public shade.    The playspace has multiple play station with different devices and furniture to explore your sensual and sexual desires.  Tables of toys!   Learn sane and safe play.  Get that heretofore unanswered question about kink answered!  No shame, no blame and no regrets!  All staff have completed consent classes by B.E.D. Multiple offerings daily.

name: Reverbia
description: Reverbia is an All Live Music Camp with 4 stages, including: The Radiance Dome (LED interactive) The Jam and Teahouse, Embassy Shad Stage, and Reverbia Main Stage. Reverbia features Daily: Calm Inside (breathe, Stretch) ,Live Music Yoga in the Morning...Dance Workshops, Open Mic/ Songwriter Showcase, Concerts in the Shade, Reverbia  Classical Music Sunsets and Live Nights, The Reverbia Childrens' Hour, and Late Night Mini Radiance Dome, and Jam and Teahouse. Reverbia also features Dance Performances, including the Production Curiouser and Curiouser. Our Tribute to Lost Musicians honors musicians who passed away the previous year.

name: rEVOLUTION
description: REVOLUTION is both a high energy camp and a chill camp.  We believe that through evolution, we can create a revolution.  We reserve the right to change, to be agents of change and to commit to the Burning Man principles each time we return after our revolution around the sun.  We offer food, beverages, healing through Gamma Breath Work and fun through dance.  West Coast Swing and Martinis.  Hot dogs and Gin & Tonic.  We feed your body, soul and sense of freedom.  There are no requirements to visit us, only the ability to participate, act on immediacy and be open to both revolution and evolution.

name: RhythmWave
description: RhythmWave brings Conscious Dance to the Playa, along with yoga and other movement practices. 5Rhythms, Open Floor, Dancing Freedom, Soul Motion and others. We offer a space to figure out what is going on inside you and to move through it. Not just a place to show off your latest dance moves. Our offerings are made on a sprung bamboo wood floor beneath a shade structure, and are offered several times daily.

name: RIPPERS ROW
description: Rippers Row is an immersive and interactive theme camp hosting daily parties with DJs playing a variety of tasty music. You're guaranteed a high energy shakedown on every Ripper dance floor. Home of the mythical GatorWalrus. Long May They Reign.

name: RIPPLE
description: The Ripple Effect reflects on the very nature of affecting change:  how one small stone tossed into a body of water causes a ripple effect with an almost never-ending forward motion.  Camp Ripple is all about tossing those positive stones to impact your own life and those of others one small metaphorical pebble at a time!

name: Risa
description: Risa is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, clothing optional beaches and friendly atmosphere. In the afternoon you can enjoy one of our snow cones and lounge in our enclosed kooled area. In the evening come eat, drink, sing, dance, play your instrument and be merry around the fire and enjoy our art.

name: RNV Camps
description: We are a Village of several long time camps from many nations and nationalities based in the Pacific Northwest. We are a diverse village that provides a wide number of interactive events. We will have DJ's playing diverse genres, host massage workshops and seminars, teach fire spanking, teach and dance the Bollywood spectacular, hold TED type talks, and provide our famous Tutu making tutorial with all the materials you need for an amazing tutu. We will be serving Kona coffee and Espresso. Come join us!

name: Roadside Distraction
description: Roll up for a hub of spectacular sidetracks and ridiculous world record breaking stations! Give it your all to set a record for "Most Clothespins Pinned to the Face in One Minute", "Speed Kissing", or "Most Animal Sounds Identified". With renowned attractions in our Chamber of Wonders, including the soul-searching experience of Burning Man's Darkest Room, the mesmerizing optical illusions and sensory delights within the Hall of Oddities, and a whimsical Give-One-Take-One Gift Shop, there's something for everyone at Roadside Distraction.

name: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs
description: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs Coffee Roasting on the Playa & serving pour over coffee in BRC since 2011. We serve single origin coffee Mon/Wed/Fri 11-2PM  We will focus on reducing our carbon footprint in BRC

name: Robotronia
description: Fun and unique interactive art including our own Pump-Bot game, Periscope of Procrastination, Hotshot the Robot, Humdrum the Washing Machine and others! Battery charging and electronics repair stations available at most hours.

name: Rock 'n' Snow
description: A camp for climbers, skiers and hikers, we love outdoors!

name: Rooftop Frose
description: Rooftop Frose for a view at sunset with a cool refreshing drink for relaxed burners

name: Rootist Lounge
description: A camp based on the love of celebrating life with beats of sound, the joy of #energy, and the beauty of #spiritual connection with self, and others. A place where acceptance, creativity, and passions flourish. It's a gathering of open-minded and like-minded individuals where friendships surround you. A place to learn, grow, inspire, heal, and release. One lounge, one vibe, one LOVE, one beautiful, and a growing family that is all connected. With a major focus on cutting-edge energy work, healing sound vibrational therapy incorporating live music, beautiful decor for the senses/art, artists, performers, yoga, workshops, hughealing, ArtCars Art car support, Art project support and so much more.

name: Rootpile Dustopia
description: Rootpile is an established themecamp at Burning Man whose mission is to bring live Bluegrass music, Bluegrass musical instrument instruction, and Southern food and culture to the burns that we attend. We offer live pro-Bluegrass music most nights of Burn week. We are open to new members who embrace our mission and culture.

name: Royal Honey
description: Art is the stored honey of the human soul, gathered on wings of inspiration and transformed into royal jelly by the contributions of many. Royal Honey is a camp with all types of bees that pollinate Playa with art, music, hugs, and love. Connect in our Meadow of Talking Flowers, enjoy sweet nectar from our Pollination Station Bar, lose yourself in our Rabbit Hole, and waggle your booty on our Queen Bee of Hearts Dancefloor.

name: Rubber Armstrong
description: For everything bad, Mezcal, for everything that is good as well, and if it still does not help, one and a half liters. We are a diverse solar powered camp made up of members from all over the world all sharing a love of Mezcal. Come join us for a delicious sunset Margie.

name: Rum Amok
description: Running Amok? Find our tropical oasis on the playa

name: Rumpus
description: Morning cartoons, fun and games, non-electronic beats, and a chill bar.

name: Rustic WerQ Ranch
description: Rustic WerQ Ranch is a camp full of people who make the many art projects happen on playa.  Drop by for a whiskey or a water.

name: Saints & Sinners
description: A welcoming and laid-back camp within Silicon Village, where most mornings are dedicated to family-friendly button making. As dusk approaches, our camp takes on a "sinnery" vibe, lighting up the street with a red glow. Our street-side shade structure is a hub of activity throughout the day, with someone always ready to greet you. Feel free to swing by and say hi!

name: Sakenoma
description: Luxury estates for your mannequin children. We have plenty to drink. Come participate and try your hand at animal husbandry while spectating our fish friendly taxidermy and bowling. The only Japanese word we know is Bukkake. It's in the sake...

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me - your friendly playa servers of various chilled and flavored sake. There's plenty of sake and chill in our shaded, cushion-ish area, plus giant Jenga and other games for all!

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a salon on the Enlightenment model—a forum for the exchange of creative ideas. We seek inspiration in sunlight by burning bright and clean. The one trace we leave is good karma. We invite the BRC community to visit our plush and welcoming Do-Me Domes, audition for silent-movie stardom, be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire, engage in interactive workshops, try on a new look at our atelier, or feast with us on vulvular waffles or sacramental cheese. We offer a safe space to decompress, meet new humans, and reconnect with yourself. We also welcome power-hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!

name: Salty Jacks
description: Camp Salty Jacks: Day and night we are the local deep dive bar of the 9:00 neighborhood. Nautical, underwater themed, we are your safe haven from the fervor of the playa playing Hip Hop, R&B, Soul, Blues, Electro-swing, and Disco.

name: Sam's House of Shit
description: Look for skull and cross-swords tire cover, hexagonal shade structure, and monkey hut

name: Sandy Taco
description: Sandy Taco; We are a gay camp, with deep shade and Taco events.  The events will be impromptu, so stop by during the week to inquire about when we might have our next Taco distribution. We have a cocktail bar and focus on adult themes during our hosting times.  Look forward to some giant jenga and naked twister as some of the fun during our seductive parties.

name: San Marco Square
description: San Marco Square is a bohemian oasis. San Marco Square has curated a selection of live performances, and music by world-renowned artists and novice creators a-like for your enjoyment in our square. The park is vibrant and alive – featuring a café/bar, a stage for performance, a large PA system, a dance floor, and several spaces for relaxation and reconnection. Interactivity will include classes hosted by knowledgeable campmates, performances from several bands and DJs, and a party of high-style and sophistication - Don't miss out! Come for the art, stay for the experience.

name: Santo Cabron
description: Anarquismo bailable para toda la familia

name: Satellite of Love
description: A shady oasis in a sea of mutants...and their mutant vehicles. Stop by, relax and enjoy our downtempo beats while sipping one of our world renowned Pineapple Upside Down Drinks. Bring your own pineapple and we'll make you something truly special.

name: Scarbutts Cafe
description: Scarbutts Cafe is the leading megacorporate ass-spanking coffee shop on the playa. Monday through Friday, 9-ish to Noon-ish, our chipper staff serve strong coffee and fantastic spankings to the groggy masses. Choose from a menu of spankings that range from mild to hot and heavy. After being served their spanking of choice by a friendly bar-assta, they are served a cup of coffee. We come with a sarcastic edge butt provide a warm, welcoming, atmosphere. New for 2024! Exclusive, Scarbutts After Dark(tm)-brand coffee will be served at a number of after-sundown VIP events including a "Coffee Cocktail Happy Hour", "Midnight Coffee" and more! Wanna know exactly what and when happens After Dark(tm)? Then come visit our Cafe for the nightly schedule ass it becomes available.

name: Schnitzel Camp
description: "Schnitzel - camp" serving best Schnitzel on playa! Watch out for the crazy food truck!

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Oh My Fur & Whiskers! You're late! You're late, for a very important date! Come follow the White Rabbit into our garden, where you can journey down a whimsical Acculturation Path with glowing & mesmerizing flowers & sparkly things. See where the rabbit has gone, Down The Rabbits Hole, to get some enlightenment and inspiration for your life! Enjoy our Tea Party, day or night, where you may encounter some personalities like Queen Elizabeth, Mr. T, Ice-T, or some Tea-Rex's!  Who knows?!  We offer restorative libations of all types during the day and Hot Toddies to warm you up on your nightly adventures.

name: Second Rodeo
description: Howdy, y'all! Second Rodeo welcomes any and all participants to enjoy cheeky and fun rodeo-themed activities, offerings, and wild hoedowns!  If it ain't a party you seek, we also specialize in providing self care amenities to those seeking respite. Let us prove to you that this isn't our first rodeo!  Come as you are, every one of y'all! Yeeeeehaw!

name: Second Wind Pirate Cafe
description: Embark on a nocturnal adventure at the Second Wind Pirate Café, a vibrant pirate-themed coffee spot that only opens its doors from 9 PM until about 1 AM. This isn't just a café; it's an experience where freshly brewed black pirate coffee is served with a side of unforgettable entertainment. Our servers, true pirate spirits, engage guests with a treasure trove of games ranging from silly to absurd. Imagine sipping on the pure, bold flavor of our coffee, no milk, sugar, or alcohol, amidst an atmosphere of playful banter and laughter. Outside, our witty pirate duo, armed with bullhorns, playfully heckles and invites passersby to join in the fun. Join us at Second Wind, where every cup of coffee is a journey and every visit is a story in the making!

name: Secret Garden
description: Lounge camp that hosts events, dance parties, and classes. Cooling rags are available in the afternoon. Feel free to sleep in our lounge if you don't want to go back to your camp at night or the wee hours of the morning.

name: Secret Mantra
description: Secret Mantra is a space that brings together the high-caliber community triggers of entrepreneurs, pioneers, and seekers of spiritual practices.

name: Send Noods
description: Want to send a unique one of a kind NoodleGram? Get crafty and dive into our pool of noodles to make your masterpiece which we will hand deliver to your loved one in BRC. Limited time only, come join our team of couriers, and experience the joy of engaging in new connections! Let us give you a safe(to the third powa) space to radically express yourself and show you what immediacy is all about! If that's not your cup of tea then just join us for a hot steamy bowl of Noods at our self serve 24 hr noodle bar.

name: Sepia Lux Homebase
description: Come find the Cuttlefish back at it's lair and say hi!

name: SERENDIPITEA
description: SERENDIPITEA, a place where you can expect terrific teas, transformative workshops, titanic parties and tons of absurdity. Come by any time and enjoy a refreshing iced tea cocktail infusion, under the shade in our desert oasis. For your recovery mornings, help yourself to a cup of tea and recharge at our crystal alter. We exist to cultivate experiences full of intimate bonds, insightful breakthroughs, incredible beats, irreverent banter and intoxicating brews. Tues (Day) and Thurs (Night) we host our big parties! Let us dream of evanescence, and linger in the beautiful foolishness of things.

name: Serenity Now
description: An oasis in a world of dust. Serenity Now is a long standing coffee house and performance space, with cold brew coffee service, featuring art and music.

name: Serpent Moon
description: Serpent Moon is a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of all of humanity. Join us for 10 Principle themed heartfelt yoga and conscious breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit. Our Serpent Moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles. We look forward to early morning movement exploration and moonlit kisses with you.

name: Servants of the Secret Fire
description: Servants of the Secret Fire have been bringing dazzling LED and fire art to playa while hosting fire spinning jams and flow workshops since 2015. Come check out our library, dance to our DJ sets, or cuddle puddles beneath a glowing canopy of >14000 LEDs - look for the burgundy/red/orange/yellow dome!

name: Shake, Shake, Shake
description: Swing by SHAKE, SHAKE, SHAKE to shake your tail feather as you enjoy an ice-cold, hand-shaken cocktails on a hot playa day. Voted "the best damn cocktail bar on the Playa" by our friends and regulars!

name: ShamanDome
description: Since 2008, Shamandome Camp has taught Core Shamanism as described by Michael Harner, and offered shamanic healing in Black Rock City, reawakening burners to their shamanic relationship to nature and helping them connect with their true animal essence as a child of Mother Earth. The real deal. The sound of a single drum, beating at 185 bpm puts you into an Altered State of Consciousness (ASC), allowing you to journey to the Lower World, where you can meet your power animal. You can do it, because you're human. This the ultimate Hero's Journey.

name: Shangri-Lounge
description: Pop-up support camp for the Shangri-Lounge human-powered mobile martini bar in Deep Playa, the Air Band interactive performances in Central Plaza, and the Ice Taxi shuttle running from Arctica to your camp. We'll serve you the finest cocktail while you relax in intimate conversation with new friends under the stars, help you live out your life-long fantasy of being a rock star, and keep your precious ice from melting all over the Playa. All you have to do is find us!

name: Shanti Town
description: We at Shanti Town Sound Movement strive to bring you the citizens of Black Rock City the most authentic experience in Reggae music and Sound System Culture. Delivering strictly Irie Vibes to Burningman since day one!

name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
description: Sharkey's Oasis: The unrivaled "Preferred Party Beyond the Porto-Potties, where Peni and Pagina frolic on the Pre-Playa Plaza Playground!"  Our mission? To delight you with delectable libations, provide respite under our shady canopy, serenade you with tunes in the lounge, and bestow upon you exhilarating and daring drinking games! 🍹🎶🎲

name: Shenanigans
description: ICE COLD face masks! Find us when the sun is high and the heat is excessive every day. We will welcome you into our comfy chill space and put a cold mask straight from our ice packed cooler on your face. While the moisturizing ingredients soak into your skin, you're welcome to kick back and enjoy the occasional water spritz, fanning and cup of iced tea.

name: Shiny's Keepers
description: Shinys' Home

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: Enjoy our famous old school tiki and pirate lounge.  But beware of pirates, sirens and cannibals offering strong grogs and potions!

name: Shitty Glitter
description: Welcome to SHITTY GLITTER, a boutique Bed and Breakfast providing the most luxurious hospitality experience in Black Rock City. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds (changed daily) and be sure to chat with a camp concierge to get the most out of your stay. Be sure to swing by The Parlor on Wednesday evening for our breakfast (for dinner) party where we'll be serving breakfast burritos and dancing the night away. If you're in need of some relaxation, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we'll be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.

name: Shitty Wood
description: We (sometimes) have wood. We burn. Established 2007.

name: Shotski Wanderlust
description: Shotski Wanderlust, we have it all! Shotski's Skiing! Snowboarding! Nipple Dunk Challenge and Après Ski in the lounge!

name: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr
description: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr, a black and white world one moment transforms into color splashing and mark making movements with cozy flickering corners. Our human steamroller printmaking event dances with carved wood which gets smooshed into making images for you to take home. Be apart of the process and enjoy some refreshing Shrubble!

name: Shuttlecocks
description: Welcome to Shuttlecocks, where we're bringing Badminton back. Our playa court is open by noon into the evening from  Monday to Saturday for pick up play. Come on by, grab a racquet and have a go! Don't miss our Tuesday BADminton cheeky happy hour and Friday afternoon tournament where you can challenge your fellow burners.
