description: Xpat Alien has searched far and wide, through many galaxies, to find a new place to rest our travel weary heads. Earth fits the bill and we have decided to stay. We bring with us the Crop Circle Cantina, complete with 80' of circular shade, phenomenal DJs spinning epic tunes, a bar top with stripper poles for dancing shenanigans, six 3-butt benches to relax on, Colorado brewed craft beer and root beer on tap, and glasses full of ice filled with our own Alien Punch.

name: Yeah Man!
description: The playa fabulous version of your favorite small town dive bar.  Music selection includes but is not limited to: Hip-Hop/Rap, Latin (Cumbia, Salsa, Reggaeton, Pop Latino), Old School, Jam Bands, Classic Rock, House, Techno, and more.  Carpeted, shaded dance area with a bar and a pink silicone stripper pole.  Ambient lighting at night.  Spank stamp paddles and Misguidance Counseling.

name: Yellow Balloon
description: Clean and Sober camp

name: Yellow Bike Project
description: The mission of the Yellow Bike Project (YBP) is to oversee the build, release, maintenance, and collection of Yellow Bikes on playa to foster community participation in the goal of sustainable transportation within Black Rock City and to help reduce the number of abandoned bikes. Yellow Bikes are meant to be used for point to point transportation and are free for anyone to use. Yellow Bikes are not meant to be locked up or decorated.

name: Yellowstone Burners
description: Step right up to the Yellowstone Burner's Playacebo Experience! We have collected artisanal water from our home area around Yellowstone National Park, infused with the natural powers of this geothermal wonderland. Your Lifetender will guide you through the process of selecting the specific water elements that are meant just for you, creating a customized elixir guaranteed - and backed by research - to give you exactly what you need.

name: YES IS MORE
description: Say YES to MORE! More love, more dancing, more awkward interactions. We're here for a good time, not a long time. Come say YES to being MORE in the moment.

name: Yes Please
description: Yes: adv. – Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent. Please: adv. – Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction. Yes Please is the answer to every question. Come chill in our calm and revitalizing sanctuary, dance with new friends, and experience our inclusive oasis of sex-positivity, queer empowerment, and love. Be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth.

name: Y Knot Saloon
description: A late 1800s western town with its saloon on wheels, apothecary, and water tower. Come for a refreshing beverage, views and live music.

name: You Are Here
description: Welcome, weary travelers! Whether you are looking for an escape from the sun, need a disco nap, or simply want to meet like-minded folks to share experiences with, You Are Here is open to all!

name: You Light Up My Ride
description: Disappointed by a poorly lit bike last night on the playa? Never fear! You Light Up My Bike is here to help and inspire you to fabulously light up your rig! Come visit us to get you bike better lit up and stay for a while and share a deep laugh or two.

name: You Look Amazing
description: You Look Amazing is not just a camp name, but a state of mind. We LOVE each and everyone of you and want to get to know you better. Our camp is an oasis of wellness at Burning Man. Where mind, body, and spirit converge in a harmonious dance of rejuvenation and exploration. Nestled amidst the pulsating energy of the playa, our camp offers a sanctuary unlike any other—a haven where participants can immerse themselves in a holistic journey of self-discovery and transformation. Join us for yoga, mindfulness, workshops, dancing and the best crepes you've ever had, we promise. They're better than sex. So come, weary travelers, and let us wrap you in dusty hugs and smiles. Tell us your stories and we'll tell you ours.

name: Your Dad's Couch: Chill Zone
description: A Conversation Corner

name: Yummm
description: Yummm is a camp dedicated to creating Yummmy (non-food) moments for everyone on playa!

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Come taste anything real or imagined at the Yum Cart! Playfully-mindful camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness. Daily experiments in vulnerability, intimacy, self-discovery, and storytelling.

name: ZAPHOD
description: Zaphod acquired a derelict spacecraft at auction. In it we found a bunch of strange green elixir and a computer displaying orders to rescue colonists on BRC2024 and something about bringing home a specimen. The Zaphod StarCastle pours absinthe snowcones and all-ages beverages periodically throughout the day, and absinthe at sunset. Come visit beforehand and learn about the organic herbs and processes we use, then celebrate the green hour up on the viewing deck! Catch a ride on Xeno the Playamorph: a menacing new  playamechanoid/Red Baron mutant vehicle. Because, Zaphod.

name: Zen as Fuck
description: Welcome to Zen as Fuck, where we blend the integration of Burning Man with the disintegration of Zen philosophy. Our camp is a sanctuary amidst the playa madness, inviting participants to find their inner peace while embracing the vibrant energy of Black Rock City. At Zen as Fuck, we believe that your trip to Burning Man is a journey of self-discovery and transformation. Join us in embracing the principles of radical self-expression and radical self-reliance as we navigate this beautiful chaos together, one mindful moment at a time.

name: Zendo Project 3:00
location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers
description: The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Peer Support Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.

name: Zendo Project 9:00
location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers
description: The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Care & Emotional Support Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.

name: Zhuangbility Base
description: Your oasis of connectivity and relaxation at Burning Man! Our camp features around-the-clock internet access, perfect for those who need to stay connected. Unwind or rev up at our 24/7 lounge bar, where the drinks flow and the ambiance uplifts. Whether you're here to chill or recharge, just look for the "Zhuangbility Base" sign and step into a space crafted for comfort and convenience.

name: !Zoom!
description: Immerse yourself in Camp !Zoom!, an aquatic playground oasis celebrating decades on the playa. Our camp offers a whimsical mix of adult-sized "sea-monkey" bars, swings, and a wobbly walk to rekindle your playful spirit. As dusk falls, be captivated by our LED seascape and thrilling fire spinning shows. Experience the joy of aerial acrobatics on our Lyra, participate in fire spinning sessions, or unwind in our serene lounge. Embracing R.I.D.E., we welcome all to share in our legacy of creativity, community, and unforgettable moments. Dive into a sea of adventure and come !ZOOM! with us!
